, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-EZJb4YqWTLU/VQj_d3yc1mI/AAAAAAAA2ZU/df1fIJUmZLg/s1600/Nasi_Gra3vvcia.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMind you, the Jews discriminated against their own. &nbsp;A Marrano who escaped from his native land,\nbut was not circumcised through neglect ( or lack of opportunity ) , was\nprevented from participating in the services in the synagogue until he was\ncircumcised.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1512, the House of\nMendes ( Crypto Jews ) , which had the monopoly of the lucrative pepper trade\nfrom Kerala open a branch office in Antwerp \u2013which made it a HUB for spice and\ndiamonds.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From Constantinople the Jew shipowners &nbsp;brought the spices to Antwerp and from there\nsold it at massive profits all over Europe.. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>To\ntheir favourite \u201cplay ball\u201d kings and Popes they send special exotic spices . The Jews found to their great joy that <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">every Catholic had his price</span> .</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\nLet me get into greater detail-<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Jew in Spain who\nchose to cling to his ancestors\u2019 faith had the option of leaving the kingdom\nand rebuilding his life elsewhere. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But in Portugal, there\nwas no such option. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The King issued a FIAT\nthat every single Jew would henceforth be considered Christian, without their\nconsent.&nbsp; The Jews were ordered to adopt Catholic\nforeign names, to participate in Christian services, and to give their children\na Catholic education. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spies and guards were\nposted at every border crossing to prevent Jews from escaping to countries\noutside the jurisdiction of the Inquisition. &nbsp;&nbsp;The iron curtain had fallen quickly,\nisolating the Jews of Portugal from the rest of the world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Among them were two rich\nSpanish Jew brothers, Tzemach and Meir Benvenisti who changed their names to Francisco\nand Diego Mendes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Out of consideration\nfor the \u201cNew Christians,\u201d the Portuguese king announced that they would be\ngiven a familiarization \u2013nay- &nbsp;acclimatization\nperiod (TEE HEEEE ) &nbsp;of thirty years. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During this time the\nInquisition would not be active in the kingdom, and no steps would be taken\nagainst those who were suspected of continuing to practice Judaism. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Jews took full\nadvantage and went on overdrive with their meanness and clannishness\u2014for they\nknew the king and the Pope had received a Kosher bribe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Christian priests\nwere terrible upset to see Jews cocking a snook by melting from church in the\nmiddle or mass or a sermon.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The PISSED OFF bishops\nwrote to the Pope \u2013KYA HO RAHA HAI ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then in 1498, Portuguese\nship captain Vasco Da Gama landed in my hometown Calicut.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Expensive spices ,diamonds,\nprecious stones, and exotic luxurious items began to travel along this route,\nplacing Portugal on the path to becoming an economic power.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1510, Francisco and\nDiego Mendes founded a spice trading company in Lisbon, the capital city of\nPortugal. Two years later, the House of Mendes opened a branch in Antwerp, and monopolized\nthe spice / diamond market by giving massive kickbacks to the right people .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Francisco Mendes soon\nbecame the &nbsp;\u201cthe spice king of Europe.\u201d\nThe brothers amassed a humongous fortune by excessive and easy profits as\nmiddlemen . They now established an international network of distributors\nthroughout Europe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The House of Mendes had\nagents in Lisbon, Antwerp, London, Paris, Aix-les-Baines, Venice, Florence,\nAncona, Salonica, Alexandria, and Constantinople. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These agents managed a\nvast network that advanced the company\u2019s interests, while maintaining a\nconstant stream of information and spy communication between the branches. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They kept a track of vulnerable\npeople like sex maniac kings and homosexual popes \u2013and if they could NOT bribe,\nthey twisted arms . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They had the pigeon\nsystem of communications and know what happened where , as soon as it happened.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A large portion of the\nwealth that the company amassed was kept aside for loans, bribes and HAFTAS to\nkings, princes, and bishops- AS A COMPANY POLICY .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The money flowed\ngenerously, but also under the watchful eyes of the Mendes brothers. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their financial ties\ntranslated into incredibly powerful political leverage, and agents of the House\nof Mendes found doors opening for them in high places at surprising times. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The House of Mendes had\na SECRET UNDERWORLD of Jews \u2013 a well established MAFIA having spies and henchmen\neverywhere .&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The craft Jews PLANTED\ntalented &nbsp;cooks, doctors, musicians,good\nlooking honey pot whores and homosexuals in Kings Palaces and Vatican . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They knew that BRIBES and\nEXPLOITING VULNERABILITY of Kings and Popes -- were the key to open all doors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Jew spies created\nRED TAPE.&nbsp; Then they took advantage of\nthe red tape. The Inquisition\u2019s supporters found themselves contending with an\nefficient, sophisticated fifth column that utilized the cumbersome bureaucracy\nof the Church to hamper its efforts in every possible way.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Documents would disappear in transit, pages would\nbe missing, vital files would be lost, important messages would never arrive at\ntheir destination, princes and rulers would succumb to massive bribes, and\nguards would disappear or fall asleep at crucial moments. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The date on which the\nInquisition had been scheduled to begin in Portugal had long passed, but the\ndiligent operations of the House of Mendes caused the church\u2019s activities to be\npostponed again and again.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marranos' presence was\nnoticeable in Rome and, even more so, the seaport of Ancona, where they thrived\nunder benevolent ( read that as BRIBED ) popes Clement VII (1523\u201334), Paul III\n(1534\u201349), and Julius III (1550\u201355).&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such\nwas the money power in cash and kind that they even received a guarantee that\nif accused of apostasy they would be subject only to papal authority. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marranos\nsettled in Venice in the 15th and early 16th centuries but were subjected to\ndecrees of expulsion in 1497 and again in 1550. &nbsp; &nbsp;Thereafter huge bribes forced the &nbsp;city policy began to change. Venice not only\nwelcomed Marranos but kept the Inquisition at bay.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crypto Jewess widow\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Dona Gracia Mendes NASI</b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> , ( Senyora Beatrice de La Luna Nassi),was a great heroine\nfor the crypto Jews Marranos&nbsp; .&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\n1552 she settled with her daughter Reyna at Constantinople and there also\nopenly confessed Judaism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her father was Alvaro\nde Luna of Aragon considered a Nasi or Prince in Hebrew and her mother was\nPhillipa Benveniste, of a Nasi family as great granddaughter of Don Abraham\nBenveniste of Castile.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1528, Beatriz de Luna Gracia Nasi married the very\nrich black pepper trader Crypto Jew &nbsp;Francisco Mendes Benveniste.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jew Francisco Mendes owned\n&nbsp;along with his brothers Diogo Mendes &nbsp;and Goncalo Mendes a bank with agents and\nbranched all over &nbsp;Europe and Mediterranean.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jew Goncalo Mendes\nfinanced the Vasco Da Gama voyages to India. This man had been to Calicut my hometown.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Diogo Mendes Mendes had\nan agent in England and financed &nbsp;/\nbribed Henry the VIII .&nbsp; &nbsp;In 1532, Henry VIII intervened personally on\nDiogo\u2019s behalf when King Charles V arrested him in Antwerp on charges of Judaizing.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mind you, they were\njust one of the six Jewish families that monopolized and controlled the spice\ntrade from India.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The house of Mendes\nfinanced the kings and queens of Portugal, Spain, England, the Flanders and the\npopes in Rome..&nbsp;&nbsp; They also controlled\nthe stock market all over Europe. The hub of the spice/diamond trade, Antwerp\nwas part of the Spanish Empire.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Following the death of\nher husband she took over his role in running the business with his brother\nDiogo taking sole charge when Diogo died. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SHE ALLOWED HER SHIPS TO BE USED BY JEWS FOR SUBVERSIVE ACTIVITIES. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-AGpC0CMogZE/VQktAHoF4rI/AAAAAAAA2Z0/rJLeeCNTd08/s1600/la-sen5jora-4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-AGpC0CMogZE/VQktAHoF4rI/AAAAAAAA2Z0/rJLeeCNTd08/s1600/la-sen5jora-4.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">Dona Gracia Mendes,</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;loaned money\nto Sultan Suleiman the Magnificent, Sultan of the Ottoman Empire.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later she brought in her nephew, who became the illustrious Joseph Nasi,\nDuke of Naxos- &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;a prominent figure in the politics of the Ottoman Empire.&nbsp;</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1544, she had a\ndispute with her sister, Brianda, &nbsp;Diogo's wife, regarding his estate, and had to\nflee to the nearby city state of Ferrara. &nbsp;&nbsp;In 1553,\nshe moved to Istanbul, in the Ottoman domains, where she arranged for her\ndaughter to marry her husband's nephew, Don Joseph Nasi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Israel\u2019s political\nleaders honored&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">Dona Gracia Mendes,</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;for the first time in October, 2010\u2014 a late recognition\nconsidering , she had risked her life and fortunes for her brother/ sister Jews more\nthan any man. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">She used her printing\npress to take out the Ferrara Bible from Sephardic source texts to break the backbone of the Catholic church.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-V6IjeqVzQ5o/VQkwLP8rolI/AAAAAAAA2aA/POPWOqAh94E/s1600/imag5jes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do they even know who\ndid it first ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1555, the newly\nelected Pope Paul IV caused about 100 Jews in the port city of Ancona to be &nbsp;ortured by the Inquisition and sentenced to be\nburned at the stake. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dona Gracia\npetitioned the sultan for help, but despite her best efforts, these Jews were\nroasted alive. For the first time in\nJewish history since the Bar Kochba rebellion, this gritty Jewess initiated a\nproactive defense.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Asking all &nbsp;Jewish merchants for solidarity, she placed an\ninternational embargo on the important Italian port of Ancona. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As soon as the\nProtestant Christianity religion was firmly established all Crypto Jews\npretended to be Protestants. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; These were the crafty people Hitler has to deal with.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bribes ensured that Marranos\nin Amsterdam differed from those in other Protestant countries in that they\nopenly practiced Judaism almost from the moment of their arrival. Thanks to the\nMarranos ( literally PIGS ) , Amsterdam became one of the greatest Jewish centers in the world<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BLAH BLAH &nbsp;to annul his long-standing marriage there was\nbiblical authority in Leviticus xviii. 16, in which an alliance between a man\nand his brother's wife is categorically forbidden. On the other hand, in\nDeuteronomy xxv. 5, such a union is expressly prescribed if the brother had\ndied childless, in order that his name should be perpetuated. The problem of\ninterpretation is highly perplexing and only qualified Rabbis can do it BLAH\nBLAH <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BLAH BLAH &nbsp;the importance of Hebrew tradition for the\ncorrect comprehension of Holy Writ is paramaount. Since Jews are &nbsp;now excluded from both England and Spain, it\nwas to the Jewish quarters of Italy, and especially to that of Venice, that can\ngive guidance&nbsp;&nbsp; BLAH BLAH <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE JEWS FUDGED THE SCRIPTURES\nBY PRINTING NEW ONES - TEEE HEEEEE !<span style=\"color: blue;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BLAH BLAH &nbsp;Henry VIII must insist on expert rabbinical\nopinions for kingly personal consideration BLAH BLAH <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY DOES AN ENGLISH\nKING CARE FOR JEW OPINION ?. TEEE HEEEE !<span style=\"color: blue;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">BLAH BLAH Marco Raphael\nmust be </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">consulted by the King\u2019s\nsolicitor to prove to prove from Leviticus that Henry\u2019s marriage to Katherine \u2013\nhis brother Arthur\u2019s widow \u2013 had been unlawful. BLAH BLAH</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">BLAH BLAH -&nbsp; ancient Jewish Law found in the Book of\nLeviticus says : \"The man who takeTH his brother's wife in marriage does a\nforbidden thing, bringing shame on his own brother; children they shall never\nhave\" (20:21). &nbsp;But Hey, this is in\ncontradiction to the command in Deuteronomy 25 that a man sire children for his\nchildless brother's widow. So this Levitican curse did not apply to King Henry.\nHe is not childless. He has a daughter &nbsp;Mary. &nbsp;So divorcing Catherine is a chenga thing to\ndo-- BLAH BLAH&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BLAH BLAH since the Pope\nhad sanctioned his marriage based on the levirate marriage described in\nDeuteronomy 25. &nbsp;In the event of a\nbrother dying childless, his brother would marry the widow and have children to\ncarry on the dead brother's name. &nbsp;Since\nthe &nbsp;texts contradict each other, then\ninterpretation and tradition must come into play. &nbsp;Only the Jews who spent quality time in\nYeshivah &nbsp;have the answer &nbsp;\u2013 SAAMPH BHI MARE LAATHI BHI NA TOOTHE . BLAH\nBLAH <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BLAH BLAH &nbsp;Venetian rabbi, Isaac Halfon, was ekdum sure\nthat since the end of the Talmudic period, the Biblical law of Yibum, requiring\na brother to marry the widow of a childless brother, had fallen into abeyance\nand only the divorce, Chalitza was used. &nbsp;Therefore the marriage contacted with Arthur\u2019s\nwidow was against Jewish law, regardless of whether it had been consummated or\nnot. Furthermore the same rabbi who had banned polygamy, Rabbeinu Gershom (960\n\u20131028) and the later Rabbeinu Tam (1100 -1171) both undisputed authorities of\nEuropean Jewry, had banned the levirate marriage on principle. BLAH BLAH<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">BLAH BLAH &nbsp;Yaakov Rephael Ben Yechiel Chaim Paglione of\nModena who are experts support Henry VIII \u2013 abhe Pope ko kya mallom .&nbsp; Italian rabbis bhi aisa hi bolta hai \u2013 chal Marco\nRaphael ko bulaake pooch ! &nbsp;KAISA\nNAAINSAAFI HAI toba toba ---BLAH BLAH&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">BLAH BLAH &nbsp; Chal hum log Rabbis ko\nlekhe halachic evidence nikaalte hain \u2013 hum log ye case jeetenge HUM HONGE\nKAAMYAAB ! &nbsp;BLAH BLAH&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">BLAH BLAH &nbsp;Let use import Bomberg Talmud,( &nbsp;the first complete set of the Talmud that was\nprinted , specially to make a CHOOT out of Henry VIII &nbsp;) &nbsp;and\nask expert Rabbis &nbsp;Rav Kolonymus ben\nDavid and his son-in-law, the rabbi, Rav Eliyahu Menachem Chalfan.&nbsp; BLAH BLAH&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">BLAH BLAH due to the\nprohibition of eishes ach, Henry VIII\u2019s marriage with Catherine was null and\nvoid since Jews no longer observed the mitzvah of yibum. See we have just found\nout that the Levitial law [that forbids marrying a sister-in-law] was never &nbsp;abolished .&nbsp;\nSee we Jews ourselves never observed&nbsp;\nthe law of Deuteronomy, after the destruction of Jerusalem, except in\nmatters concerning inheritance. &nbsp;You can\nsafely enter a second marriage. &nbsp;Don\u2019t let\nthe Pope fool you. BLAH BLAH</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">BLAH BLAH&nbsp; Why should an Englishman &nbsp;be subservient to Rome?
