, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">After some time the Indian Guru is bumped off\nby poison and a white man is inserted as the Guru, who does his own thing and\ncreates a new Hinduism meant for decadent whites. ( Maharaj/ Osho types ).<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Mind you groups have\ngeographical divides too- like Kashmiri Shaivism.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Then R created\nSampradayas / Paramparas&nbsp;&nbsp; ( tradition )\nby Guru Diksha&nbsp; attunement ).<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">R put fog all over the\nSampradaya system using the wives of gods too.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Example: Vaishnava\nsampradayas,-- there are hundreds of them --your head will spin .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Srivaishnavism (Sri-Vaishnava\nSampradaya)/Srivaishnava/Sri Sampradaya/Iyengar is associated with Lakshmi. The\nprincipal acharyas are Ramanujacharya and Vedanta Desikan.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Ramanandi Sampradaya,\nalso known as the Ramayat Sampradaya or the Ramavat Sampradaya adheres to the\nteachings of Ramananda.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Vishistadvaita includes\nUdhava Sampradaya to which also the Swaminarayan Sampradaya belongs. They\nadhere to the teachings of Ramanuja.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Swaminarayan Hinduism\nor Swaminarayanism, based on the teachings of Swaminarayan.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Gaudiya Vaishnavism\nwith Chaitanya Mahaprabhu(Gaurangacharya).<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Krishnaism or\nBhagavatism. Rudra Sampradaya. The principal acharya is Vallabhacharya.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Kumara Sampradaya is\nthe tradition associated with Four Kumaras. The principal acharya is Nimbarka,\nhence Nimbarka Sampradaya.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">The poor Hindu was\ntotally confused --with the FAKE Mutts and FAKE acharyas lording it over. They\nthrew in the maharishis too into the kichdi for good measure.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaishnava Sampradaya ,\nsub sect Manavala Mamunigal- Vyasa, Parasara, Bodhayana. Sects for every\nacharya in lineage -Lord Narayana,</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lakshmi, Vishweksenar, Nammalwar, Nathamuni, Uyyakondar, Manakal Nambi,\nAlavandar, Periya Nambi, Ramanujacharya , Vedanta Desikan , Vadagalai\nsampradaya., Thenacharya Sampradaya, Vaikhanasa Sampradaya, Srimanta\nSankaradeva sampradata ,Krishna Pranami Sampradaya, BLAH BLAH</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Shaivites had the\ncorpse eating Shiva Aghori sect .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Saiva Siddhanta,\nadheres to the teachings of Tirumular/Sundaranatha (Nandinatha Sampradaya, the\nmonistic school) or of Meykandadeva (Meykandar Sampradaya, the dualistic\nschool).<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Adinath Sampradaya or\nSiddha Siddhanta, adheres to the teachings of Gorakhnath and Matsyendranath.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Shiva Advaita, adheres\nto the teachings of Nilakantha (Srikantha) and Appayya Dikshitar.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Kashmir Shaivism,\nadheres to the teachings of Vasugupta and his disciplinic lineage, including\nAbhinavagupta.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Pashupata Shaivism,\nadheres to the teachings of Lakulisa .BLAH BLAH<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">&nbsp;Devi ( shakti ) had hundreds of sub sects .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Advaita&nbsp; Smarta communities ( just an example ) :<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.3999996185303px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_365M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/04562587592117901644\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Dhirendra Pandey</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/03/protestant-christianity-created-by-jews.html?showComment=1426938587787#c179819716456005471\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">March 21, 2015 at 5:19 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_365MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSome foreign funded NGOs along with traitors among us are now spreading propaganda to force India to sign treaty banning land mines. They are questioning the viability of land mines in checking cross border infiltration. India has long borders with hostile nations sharing most of it. In such conditions it will be a grave error if India stops using them. Land mines may not have been 100% potent in stopping mercenaries but they do have a great contribution in defence of borders. Many EU countries have signed the treaty to ban mines because they don't need it; our security needs are different than those of EU nations.<br />\nThere is also a catch in this. In absence of land mines India will have to buy ultra modern sensors to keep an eye on borders ; thus the western armament czars will get an opportunity to milk us. Sensors may detect small bands of infiltrators but they can't stop large contingents of enemy soldiers even after detection.</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_365BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.3999996185303px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_367T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_365b+seedFuD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_367TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-arrow\" id=\"bc_0_367TA\" style=\"background: url(data:image/png; display: inline-block; height: 6px; margin: 0.3em; overflow: visible; padding-right: 4px; width: 7px;\"></span></span></span><img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DUOJiRC5obw/UwiDtflONuI/AAAAAAAAppU/hpxnNJK2CIw/s1600/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_367TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\" unselectable=\"on\"><div style=\"zoom: 1;\" unselectable=\"on\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_367B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_365b+seedFuD\" kind=\"d\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9076909347124992666\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_367M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u00b7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Fighting must begin no earlier than\nsunrise and end exactly at sunset.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u00b7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Multiple warriors may not attack a\nsingle warrior.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u00b7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Two warriors may \u201cduel\u201d, or engage in\nprolonged personal combat, only if they carry the same weapons and they are on\nthe same mount (no mount, a horse, an elephant, or a chariot).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u00b7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No warrior may kill or injure a\nwarrior who has surrendered.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u00b7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; One who surrenders , becomes a prisoner\nof war - subject to the protection of a POW.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u00b7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No warrior may kill or injure an\nunarmed warrior.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u00b7&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No warrior may kill or injure an\nunconscious warrior.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u00b7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No warrior may kill or injure a person\nor animal not taking part in the war.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u00b7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No warrior may kill or injure a\nwarrior whose back is turned away.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u00b7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No warrior may attack a woman.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u00b7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No warrior may strike an animal not\nconsidered a direct threat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u00b7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The rules specific to each weapon must\nbe followed. For example, it is prohibited to strike below the waist in mace\nwarfare.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead, she has a secret affair with her\nchildhood sweetheart, Robert Dudley, Earl of Leicester (Joseph Fiennes). Elizabeth feels that such relations could give a man too much\npower over her.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before 1492, the population on the island of\nHispaniola probably numbered above 3 million. Within 20 years of Spanish\narrival, it was reduced to only 60,000. &nbsp;Within 50 years, not a single original\nnative inhabitant could be found.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The initial Arawak\npopulation was estimated at 8,000,000. &nbsp;By 1516 only around 12,000 were still\nalive. By 1542, less than 200 remained. By 1555, the Arawaks were all gone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/christopher-columbus-father-of-american.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/christopher-columbus-father-of-american.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/8_7tVE1_cpE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"http://www.youtube.com/embed/8_7tVE1_cpE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">William Tyndale had\nbeen executed for&nbsp; daring to print an\nEnglish Bible . In 1536 he was convicted of heresy and &nbsp;burnt at the stake.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-p-MI5f07PSE/VQ--ycPIj3I/AAAAAAAA2gg/jn4ueP_6re4/s1600/the-inquis2vition-catholic-and-protestant-30-728.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-p-MI5f07PSE/VQ--ycPIj3I/AAAAAAAA2gg/jn4ueP_6re4/s1600/the-inquis2vition-catholic-and-protestant-30-728.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crypto Jew Thomas\nCromwell&nbsp; tried his best to save him.\nTill today nobody has been able to figure out how Tyndale mastered Hebrew. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tyndale's translation\nwas the first English Bible to draw directly from Hebrew and Greek texts. It\nwas taken to be a direct challenge to the hegemony of both the Roman Catholic\nChurch and the laws of England to maintain the church's position.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZZoorRaGKAY/VQ--4DfvpAI/AAAAAAAA2go/q_kX0XEyAeU/s1600/do23wnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZZoorRaGKAY/VQ--4DfvpAI/AAAAAAAA2go/q_kX0XEyAeU/s1600/do23wnload.jpg\" width=\"224\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King James Version (\n1611 ) was not the first English translation of the Bible.&nbsp; &nbsp;The\nTyndale Bible was translated in 1526. He does use the word church twice, but\nonly in reference to Hindu ( pagan ) Temples.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Christians must\nknow that more than 90 per cent of the New Testament &nbsp;was written by William Tyndale.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-fBQKPNquGtg/VQ--rCMP8GI/AAAAAAAA2gY/dCLdJ25z44k/s1600/imcvvbages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RlJZ9DNPdgs/VQ_E5zziasI/AAAAAAAA2g4/Pa7_J3jKrpg/s1600/imrrtages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; ( </span><span style=\"color: red;\">TO BE A GOD YOU MUST PUT YOUR PRICK IN HAJAAAR\n&nbsp;HOLES, RIGHT ?</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">) <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"Now if any of you\nwill deny the plurality of wives, and continue to do so, I promise that you\nwill be damned,\" (Journal of Discourses, vol. 3, p. 266). Also, \"The\nonly men who become Gods, even the Sons of God, are those who enter into\npolygamy,\" (Journal of Discourses, vol. 11, p. 269).</span></i></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BRIGHAM YOUNG&nbsp; ( THE MOSES ) DID NOT LIKE BLACKS AT ALL.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEN WHY ARE THE\nMORMONS IN INDIA ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>GMKAK? &nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"Shall I tell you\nthe law of God in regard to the African race? If the white man who belongs to\nthe chosen seed mixes his blood with the seed of Cain, the penalty, under the\nlaw of God, is death on the spot. This will always be so.\" (Journal of\nDiscourses, vol. 10, p. 110).</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I am reminded of a joke-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A cute young girl of 6\nyears age, was quarantined by her parents \u2013who were going to attend a wedding.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The parents said \u2013NOPE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your tongue is too foul\u2014you\nalways give vulgar abuse .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The girl promised \u2013NOT to\nopen her mouth- a vow of silence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On that condition \u2013she was\ntaken along.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the wedding if this\nsmall girl saw any guest \u2013she would go running \u2013 hold &nbsp;her middle finger out \u2013 then she would make a\nhole with her fore and middle finger and hold it up in the guests face \u2013 after that\nshe would make up and down motions with her whole fore arm.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One puzzled guest who\nknew the girls parents went and told them- to control the girl who was running\nwild ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mother caught her\ndaughter , boxed her ears and asked her\u2014what she is up to.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">Holding middle finger\nup meant\u2014</span><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">TUM LADKE WAALON KE TARAF SE HAI KYA ? </span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">( pray, are you from the bridegroom's party )</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Holding the slit hole\nwith fore/middle finger meant- </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">TUM LADKI WAALON KE TARAF SE HAI KYA ? </span><span style=\"color: red;\">( prithee, are you from the bride's party )</span></b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">Pumping up and down vigorously\nwith her whole forearm meant \u2013 &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">DOONON NAHI\nHAI TOH \u2014 IDHAR GAAND MARNE KO AAYA KYA ? </span><span style=\"color: red;\">( oh blimey, &nbsp;if it aint either , have you come here to bugger us ?)&nbsp;</span></b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-905-AjFD6pU/VRAaAR7k3NI/AAAAAAAA2hg/sYzRPGu8TjI/s1600/downl2voad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-905-AjFD6pU/VRAaAR7k3NI/AAAAAAAA2hg/sYzRPGu8TjI/s1600/downl2voad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">R had made many\nhomeless vagabonds into avatars of Indian gods .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I am reminded of a\nscene when I was just 10 years old. A middle aged stranger came and sat in our\nfamily owned paddy field in my fathers village \u2013 a beautiful vast green field\nbetween the railway track and the sea .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was found totally\nnaked \u2013with a side of his stomach teeming with maggots.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole village\ncollected to see the maggots a sight they had never seen before. When people\ntried to pour some diluted Dettol , for the first time he made an action saying\nNO !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anyway since young women\nwalked past they gave him some rags and a jute cask to sit on.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Next day they found\nthat he had made a langot out of the jute sack and did NOT use anything else.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People started giving\nhim food . &nbsp;He would ignore the food, but\nat night he would eat some fruits.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When I heard about this\nI went to see the guy \u2013 23 kms from my home in Calicut.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People made a tent over\nhis head \u2013 and he just sat there .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When my fathers elder\nbrother visited our home, I heard them discussing about this guy. My father\nsaid \u201c If that man dies there , the Hindus will make a god out of him , like\nShirdi Sai Baba \u201c.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anyway, after a couple\nof years , this mean looked very healthy \u2013and people had indeed started praying\nto him.&nbsp; People came from neighbouring\nvillages and cities . &nbsp;This man would\nignore all of them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One day the word spread\nlike wild fire that he had got up and had worn a shirt, pant and shoes from a\nbrief case\u2014all expensive stuff.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hundreds &nbsp;of people gathered. &nbsp;He sa</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">id in English and Gujarati- that he is\ngoing back to Surat . And he hopped on to a bus-- and that was the last they saw\nof him.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not even a thank you.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People vouched that\nthey prayed to him and their prayers were answered.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When I asked my father\nabout this he said \u2013 the Hindu idol is just a point of focus . It need NOT be\nan idol, it can be a mountain-- it could be a stone .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My father was in RSS\nbefore Independence and they would have to attend regular discourses from holy\nmen like Swami Chinmayananda .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Learning from this , I\nhave cured many sailors at sea- using the sun. I have made people to wish for something\nwhen the sun set and a GREEN FLASH showed \u2013and the sailors came to thank me\nlater \u2013 claiming that their wished came true. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such is the power of\nthe human mind . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such are the powers of\nintention.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; thus the wise say the path to Salvation is\nhard,</span></i>\"-- <b>Katha-Upanishad. 5000 BC</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nThe world largest pilgrimage is Sabarimala in Kerala\u2014NOT Mecca or Kumbh Mela or Tirupati or whatever.</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">The magic here works on this principle of &nbsp;PURE AWARENESS.</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">The magic works in between two flashes of light.</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">The whole idea is to see the 3 flashes. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">The first flash is a STANDBY .</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Between the second and third &nbsp;flash where millions focus on a single point \u2013 the magic happens .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; They have to be barefoot for 41 days ( grounding ), no non-veg, no sex, praying , wearing only black cotton. &nbsp;You can break any bad habit in 21 days\u2014here you do DOUBLE TIME.</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">The few seconds of time between the second and third flashes is one of pure awareness, which causes group resonance and quantum entrainment. &nbsp;Prana is amplified and focused like a laser beam.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">This is quantum physics . &nbsp;Quantum healing works outside the fabric of space time, and does NOT follow cause/ effect rules. &nbsp;Quantum Entrainment is a natural process of human consciousness .All you need is pure awareness. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">The brief few seconds between the second and third flashes is one of pure awareness.</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RXjh8GvJxpk/VRDpzbeR4wI/AAAAAAAA2io/8VTyNDE7Eb4/s1600/image9hs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RXjh8GvJxpk/VRDpzbeR4wI/AAAAAAAA2io/8VTyNDE7Eb4/s1600/image9hs.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\u201cNothing\u201d doesn\u2019t give answers, it IS the answer. &nbsp; Deep peace is the side effects of this experience of \u201cno-thing\u201d or \u201cno-thought.\u201d &nbsp;Millions have opened the third eye for a few seconds .</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Sabarimala Makaravilakku is the only experience on this planet which affords you this magic. &nbsp;The deity is Lord Ayyappa , the 9th avatar of Vishnu ( which was fudged by the immoral white invader to be Buddha )&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">This is not a meditation. This is a shift in perception. It is the realization that you are more than your thoughts. &nbsp;Something is there beyond your mind. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Quantum entrainment &nbsp;is a process that instantly gives the body, mind and spirit deep rest and fast healing. &nbsp;It works in seconds. &nbsp;Yes, pure awareness is the deepest rest you can get.</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">The quantum entrained pilgrim does \u201cnothing,\u201d yet everything gets done for him.</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Modern physics is familiar now with principle of resonance and the resonant coupling of harmonic oscillators, which also gives rise to sympathetic vibrations. Entrainment, sympathetic vibration, resonant frequencies, and resonant systems all fall under the rubric of resonance.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Resonance can be broadly defined as \"the impact of one vibration on another\u201d &nbsp;The amazing aspect of resonance is the process of entrainment-- changing the rate of brain waves, breaths, or heartbeats from one speed to another through exposure to external, periodic rhythms.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">All this was known to our ancient Maharishis who explored consciousness and sympathetic resonance. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sultan Adulhamid II\nappears to have sealed his fate with the D\u00f6nmeh with this statement to his\nOttoman court: &nbsp;-</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cAdvise Dr. Herzl not to\ntake any further steps in his project. I cannot give away even a handful of the\nsoil of this land for it is not my own, it belongs to the entire Islamic\nnation. If the\nIslamic Khalifate state is one day destroyed then they will be able to take\nPalestine without a price! The city became Istanbul, after the Ataturk government in 1923\nobjected to the traditional name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ataturk also abolished\nTurkey\u2019s use of the Arabic script and forced the country to adopt the western\nalphabet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The 1973 book, The Secret Jews, by Rabbi\nJoachim Prinz, wrote that Mustafa Kemal Ataturk and his finance minister,\nDjavid Bey, were committed D\u00f6nmeh .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Allah, but had their\nreal prophet [Sabbatai Zevi, the Messiah of Smyrna].\u201d In The Forward of January\n28, 1994, Hillel Halkin wrote in The New York Sun that Ataturk recited the\nJewish Shema Yisrael (\u201cHear O Israel\u201d), saying that it was \u201cmy prayer too.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The information is\nrecounted from an autobiography by journalist Itamar Ben-Avi, who claims\nAtaturk, then a young Turkish army captain, revealed he was Jewish in a\nJerusalem hotel bar one rainy night during the winter of 1911. In addition,\nAtaturk attended the Semsi Effendi grade school in Salonica, run by a D\u00f6nmeh\nnamed Simon Zevi. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was Ataturk\u2019s and\nthe Young Turks\u2019 support for Zionism, the creation of a Jewish homeland in\nPalestine, after World War I and during Nazi rule in Europe that endeared\nTurkey to Israel and vice versa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Till the abolition of\nthe Caliphate, Mustafa Kemal always posed as a sincere and pious Muslim. Stating that\n\"We do not receive our laws from the sky\" referring to Quran.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Changed mosque\nprayer mats to wooden pews, to obstruct the Muslim style of prayer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Banned the\ntraditional and immensely popular Turkish hat, banned women from wearing the\nveil.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. \"Philosophic\ntraining\" for mosque preachers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. Wearing of shoes in\nmosque, as opposed to the tradition of taking off shoes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. Attempted installing\nmusical choirs in places of worship.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was under the\nChitpavan brahmin Peshwas that the Maratha Empire came to its end through its\nformal annexation into the British Empire by the British East India Company in\n1818-- read this line a hundred times.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Emperor Shahu was arm\ntwisted by Rothschild to appoint Chitpavan Jew-- nay --Brahmin Balaji\nVishwanath Bhat as the fifth Peshwa (prime minister), and then, subsequently,\nmade the office of Peshwa hereditary. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the reign of the\nsuccessive Peshwas, the Chitpavans Jews \u2013nay-&nbsp;\nBrahmins settled in various provinces under the Peshwa rule and spread\ntheir tentacles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jew Rothschild ensured that\nChitpavan Jew - nay- brahmins established themselves firmly in the social hierarchy of the\nentire Marathi-speaking region. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The REAL Maratha DESHHASTA brahmins fell from\nthe pecking order to number 2 spot . &nbsp;Yet\nthese genuine Maratha Brahmins never gave their sins and daughters to Chitpavan\nbrahmins for marriage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">Nobody were man enough\nto shout out that 2 generations ago there were NO Chitpavan Brahmins around , and\nwho the hell are these fair, grey eyed, &nbsp;non-veg , SHREWD and EXTREMIST people \u2014 who suddenly\ngot to eat all the cake, and wear the sacred thread ..</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild imported\nBalaji Vishwanth Bhat Peshwa ( below ) from Ratnagari to the Pune-Satara area and Emperor\nShahu was arm twisted to.appoint the Peshwa or Chief Minister in 1713. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
