font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">We appreciate all that President Obama has\ndone for Israel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Now, some of that is widely known.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Some of that is widely known, like\nstrengthening security cooperation and intelligence sharing, opposing\nanti-Israel resolutions at the U.N.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Some of what the president has done for\nIsrael is less well- known.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">I called him in 2010 when we had the Carmel\nforest fire, and he immediately agreed to respond to my request for urgent aid.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">In 2011, we had our embassy in Cairo under\nsiege, and again, he provided vital assistance at the crucial moment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Or his support for more missile interceptors\nduring our operation last summer when we took on Hamas terrorists.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">( A</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">HAJAAR PPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">In each of those moments, I called the\npresident, and he was there.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">And some of what the president has done for\nIsrael might never be known, because it touches on some of the most sensitive\nand strategic issues that arise between an American president and an Israeli\nprime minister.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">But I know it, and I will always be grateful\nto President Obama for that support.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">And Israel is grateful to you, the American\nCongress, for your support, for supporting us in so many ways, especially in\ngenerous military assistance and missile defense, including Iron Dome.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">( HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Last summer, millions of Israelis were\nprotected from thousands of Hamas rockets because this capital dome helped\nbuild our Iron Dome.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Thank you, America. Thank you for everything\nyou've done for Israel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">My friends, I've come here today because, as\nprime minister of Israel, I feel a profound obligation to speak to you about an\nissue that could well threaten the survival of my country and the future of my\npeople: Iran's quest for nuclear weapons.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">We're an ancient people. In our nearly 4,000\nyears of history, many have tried repeatedly to destroy the Jewish people.\nTomorrow night, on the Jewish holiday of Purim, we'll read the Book of Esther.\nWe'll read of a powerful Persian viceroy named Haman, who plotted to destroy\nthe Jewish people some 2,500 years ago. But a courageous Jewish woman, Queen\nEsther, exposed the plot and gave for the Jewish people the right to defend\nthemselves against their enemies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">The plot was foiled. Our people were saved.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Today the Jewish people face another attempt\nby yet another Persian potentate to destroy us. Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah\nKhamenei spews the oldest hatred, the oldest hatred of anti-Semitism with the\nnewest technology. He tweets that Israel must be annihilated -- he tweets. You\nknow, in Iran, there isn't exactly free Internet. But he tweets in English that\nIsrael must be destroyed. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">For those who believe that Iran threatens the\nJewish state, but not the Jewish people, listen to Hassan Nasrallah, the leader\nof Hezbollah, Iran's chief terrorist proxy. He said: If all the Jews gather in\nIsrael, it will save us the trouble of chasing them down around the world. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">But Iran's regime is not merely a Jewish\nproblem, any more than the Nazi regime was merely a Jewish problem. The 6\nmillion Jews murdered by the Nazis were but a fraction of the 60 million people\nkilled in World War II. So, too, Iran's regime poses a grave threat, not only\nto Israel, but also the peace of the entire world. To understand just how\ndangerous Iran would be with nuclear weapons, we must fully understand the\nnature of the regime. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">The people of Iran are very talented people.\nThey're heirs to one of the world's great civilizations. But in 1979, they were\nhijacked by religious zealots -- religious zealots who imposed on them\nimmediately a dark and brutal dictatorship. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">That year, the zealots drafted a\nconstitution, a new one for Iran. It directed the revolutionary guards not only\nto protect Iran's borders, but also to fulfill the ideological mission of\njihad. The regime's founder, Ayatollah Khomeini, exhorted his followers to\n\"export the revolution throughout the world.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">I'm standing here in Washington, D.C. and the\ndifference is so stark. America's founding document promises life, liberty and\nthe pursuit of happiness. Iran's founding document pledges death, tyranny, and\nthe pursuit of jihad. And as states are collapsing across the Middle East, Iran\nis charging into the void to do just that.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Iran's goons in Gaza, its lackeys in Lebanon,\nits revolutionary guards on the Golan Heights are clutching Israel with three\ntentacles of terror. Backed by Iran, Assad is slaughtering Syrians. Back by\nIran, Shiite militias are rampaging through Iraq. Back by Iran, Houthis are\nseizing control of Yemen, threatening the strategic straits at the mouth of the\nRed Sea. Along with the Straits of Hormuz, that would give Iran a second\nchoke-point on the world's oil supply.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Just last week, near Hormuz, Iran carried out\na military exercise blowing up a mock U.S. aircraft carrier. That's just last\nweek, while they're having nuclear talks with the United States. But\nunfortunately, for the last 36 years, Iran's attacks against the United States\nhave been anything but mock. And the targets have been all too real. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Iran took dozens of Americans hostage in\nTehran, murdered hundreds of American soldiers, Marines, in Beirut, and was\nresponsible for killing and maiming thousands of American service men and women\nin Iraq and Afghanistan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Beyond the Middle East, Iran attacks America\nand its allies through its global terror network. It blew up the Jewish\ncommunity center and the Israeli embassy in Buenos Aires. It helped Al Qaida\nbomb U.S. embassies in Africa. It even attempted to assassinate the Saudi\nambassador, right here in Washington, D.C.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">In the Middle East, Iran now dominates four\nArab capitals, Baghdad, Damascus, Beirut and Sanaa. And if Iran's aggression is\nleft unchecked, more will surely follow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">So, at a time when many hope that Iran will\njoin the community of nations, Iran is busy gobbling up the nations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">We must all stand together to stop Iran's march\nof conquest, subjugation and terror.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Uo9nk7DtoSc/VPe2nHuJbtI/AAAAAAAA11I/y8bdHHYsJUc/s1600/palesti5Hne026.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"332\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Uo9nk7DtoSc/VPe2nHuJbtI/AAAAAAAA11I/y8bdHHYsJUc/s1600/palesti5Hne026.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Now, two years ago, we were told to give\nPresident Rouhani and Foreign Minister Zarif a chance to bring change and\nmoderation to Iran. Some change! Some moderation!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Rouhani's government hangs gays, persecutes\nChristians, jails journalists and executes even more prisoners than before.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Last year, the same Zarif who charms Western\ndiplomats laid a wreath at the grave of Imad Mughniyeh. Imad Mughniyeh is the\nterrorist mastermind who spilled more American blood than any other terrorist\nbesides Osama bin Laden. I'd like to see someone ask him a question about that.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Iran's regime is as radical as ever, its\ncries of \"Death to America,\" that same America that it calls the\n\"Great Satan,\" as loud as ever.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Now, this shouldn't be surprising, because\nthe ideology of Iran's revolutionary regime is deeply rooted in militant Islam,\nand that's why this regime will always be an enemy of America.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Don't be fooled. The battle between Iran and\nISIS doesn't turn Iran into a friend of America.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Iran and ISIS are competing for the crown of\nmilitant Islam. One calls itself the Islamic Republic. The other calls itself\nthe Islamic State. Both want to impose a militant Islamic empire first on the\nregion and then on the entire world. They just disagree among themselves who\nwill be the ruler of that empire.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">In this deadly game of thrones, there's no\nplace for America or for Israel, no peace for Christians, Jews or Muslims who\ndon't share the Islamist medieval creed, no rights for women, no freedom for\nanyone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">So when it comes to Iran and ISIS, the enemy\nof your enemy is your enemy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">The difference is that ISIS is armed with\nbutcher knives, captured weapons and YouTube, whereas Iran could soon be armed\nwith intercontinental ballistic missiles and nuclear bombs. We must always\nremember -- I'll say it one more time -- the greatest dangers facing our world\nis the marriage of militant Islam with nuclear weapons. To defeat ISIS and let\nIran get nuclear weapons would be to win the battle, but lose the war. We can't\nlet that happen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE) <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-cBzAv3cYRsI/VPe19W9LAKI/AAAAAAAA108/CoPbceH_LiI/s1600/zzzzsbara-T7op-ed-ckutfdhallenge-poster%2B(2).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"456\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-cBzAv3cYRsI/VPe19W9LAKI/AAAAAAAA108/CoPbceH_LiI/s1600/zzzzsbara-T7op-ed-ckutfdhallenge-poster%2B(2).jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">But that, my friends, is exactly what could\nhappen, if the deal now being negotiated is accepted by Iran. That deal will\nnot prevent Iran from developing nuclear weapons. It would all but guarantee\nthat Iran gets those weapons, lots of them. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Let me explain why. While the final deal has\nnot yet been signed, certain elements of any potential deal are now a matter of\npublic record. You don't need intelligence agencies and secret information to\nknow this. You can Google it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Absent a dramatic change, we know for sure\nthat any deal with Iran will include two major concessions to Iran.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">The first major concession would leave Iran\nwith a vast nuclear infrastructure, providing it with a short break-out time to\nthe bomb. Break-out time is the time it takes to amass enough weapons-grade\nuranium or plutonium for a nuclear bomb.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">According to the deal, not a single nuclear\nfacility would be demolished. Thousands of centrifuges used to enrich uranium\nwould be left spinning. Thousands more would be temporarily disconnected, but\nnot destroyed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Because Iran's nuclear program would be left\nlargely intact, Iran's break-out time would be very short -- about a year by\nU.S. assessment, even shorter by Israel's.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">And if -- if Iran's work on advanced\ncentrifuges, faster and faster centrifuges, is not stopped, that break-out time\ncould still be shorter, a lot shorter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">True, certain restrictions would be imposed\non Iran's nuclear program and Iran's adherence to those restrictions would be\nsupervised by international inspectors. But here's the problem. You see,\ninspectors document violations; they don't stop them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Inspectors knew when North Korea broke to the\nbomb, but that didn't stop anything. North Korea turned off the cameras, kicked\nout the inspectors. Within a few years, it got the bomb.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Now, we're warned that within five years\nNorth Korea could have an arsenal of 100 nuclear bombs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Like North Korea, Iran, too, has defied\ninternational inspectors. It's done that on at least three separate occasions\n-- 2005, 2006, 2010. Like North Korea, Iran broke the locks, shut off the\ncameras. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Now, I know this is not gonna come a shock --\nas a shock to any of you, but Iran not only defies inspectors, it also plays a\npretty good game of hide-and-cheat with them. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">The U.N.'s nuclear watchdog agency, the IAEA,\nsaid again yesterday that Iran still refuses to come clean about its military\nnuclear program. Iran was also caught -- caught twice, not once, twice --\noperating secret nuclear facilities in Natanz and Qom, facilities that\ninspectors didn't even know existed. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Right now, Iran could be hiding nuclear\nfacilities that we don't know about, the U.S. and Israel. As the former head of\ninspections for the IAEA said in 2013, he said, \"If there's no undeclared\ninstallation today in Iran, it will be the first time in 20 years that it\ndoesn't have one.\" Iran has proven time and again that it cannot be\ntrusted. And that's why the first major concession is a source of great\nconcern. It leaves Iran with a vast nuclear infrastructure and relies on\ninspectors to prevent a breakout. That concession creates a real danger that\nIran could get to the bomb by violating the deal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">But the second major concession creates an\neven greater danger that Iran could get to the bomb by keeping the deal.\nBecause virtually all the restrictions on Iran's nuclear program will\nautomatically expire in about a decade. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Now, a decade may seem like a long time in\npolitical life, but it's the blink of an eye in the life of a nation. It's a\nblink of an eye in the life of our children. We all have a responsibility to\nconsider what will happen when Iran's nuclear capabilities are virtually\nunrestricted and all the sanctions will have been lifted. Iran would then be\nfree to build a huge nuclear capacity that could product many, many nuclear\nbombs. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Iran's Supreme Leader says that openly. He\nsays, Iran plans to have 190,000 centrifuges, not 6,000 or even the 19,000 that\nIran has today, but 10 times that amount -- 190,000 centrifuges enriching\nuranium. With this massive capacity, Iran could make the fuel for an entire\nnuclear arsenal and this in a matter of weeks, once it makes that decision. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">My long-time friend, John Kerry, Secretary of\nState, confirmed last week that Iran could legitimately possess that massive\ncentrifuge capacity when the deal expires. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Now I want you to think about that. The\nforemost sponsor of global terrorism could be weeks away from having enough\nenriched uranium for an entire arsenal of nuclear weapons and this with full\ninternational legitimacy. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">And by the way, if Iran's Intercontinental\nBallistic Missile program is not part of the deal, and so far, Iran refuses to\neven put it on the negotiating table. Well, Iran could have the means to\ndeliver that nuclear arsenal to the far-reach corners of the earth, including\nto every part of the United States. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">So you see, my friends, this deal has two\nmajor concessions: one, leaving Iran with a vast nuclear program and two,\nlifting the restrictions on that program in about a decade. That's why this\ndeal is so bad. It doesn't block Iran's path to the bomb; it paves Iran's path\nto the bomb.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">So why would anyone make this deal? Because\nthey hope that Iran will change for the better in the coming years, or they\nbelieve that the alternative to this deal is worse?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Well, I disagree. I don't believe that Iran's\nradical regime will change for the better after this deal. This regime has been\nin power for 36 years, and its voracious appetite for aggression grows with\neach passing year. This deal would wet appetite -- would only wet Iran's\nappetite for more.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Would Iran be less aggressive when sanctions\nare removed and its economy is stronger? If Iran is gobbling up four countries\nright now while it's under sanctions, how many more countries will Iran devour\nwhen sanctions are lifted? Would Iran fund less terrorism when it has mountains\nof cash with which to fund more terrorism?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Why should Iran's radical regime change for\nthe better when it can enjoy the best of both world's: aggression abroad,\nprosperity at home?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">This is a question that everyone asks in our\nregion. Israel's neighbors -- Iran's neighbors know that Iran will become even\nmore aggressive and sponsor even more terrorism when its economy is unshackled\nand it's been given a clear path to the bomb.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">And many of these neighbors say they'll\nrespond by racing to get nuclear weapons of their own. So this deal won't\nchange Iran for the better; it will only change the Middle East for the worse.\nA deal that's supposed to prevent nuclear proliferation would instead spark a\nnuclear arms race in the most dangerous part of the planet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">This deal won't be a farewell to arms. It\nwould be a farewell to arms control. And the Middle East would soon be\ncrisscrossed by nuclear tripwires. A region where small skirmishes can trigger big\nwars would turn into a nuclear tinderbox. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">If anyone thinks -- if anyone thinks this\ndeal kicks the can down the road, think again. When we get down that road,\nwe'll face a much more dangerous Iran, a Middle East littered with nuclear\nbombs and a countdown to a potential nuclear nightmare.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Ladies and gentlemen, I've come here today to\ntell you we don't have to bet the security of the world on the hope that Iran\nwill change for the better. We don't have to gamble with our future and with\nour children's future.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">We can insist that restrictions on Iran's\nnuclear program not be lifted for as long as Iran continues its aggression in\nthe region and in the world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Before lifting those restrictions, the world\nshould demand that Iran do three things. First, stop its aggression against its\nneighbors in the Middle East. Second...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Second, stop supporting terrorism around the\nworld.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">And third, stop threatening to annihilate my\ncountry, Israel, the one and only Jewish state.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Thank you.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Rqj8xbHK3-Q/VPe0kqQpdnI/AAAAAAAA10o/Y-4C_i6S63Y/s1600/imaV5ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"231\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Rqj8xbHK3-Q/VPe0kqQpdnI/AAAAAAAA10o/Y-4C_i6S63Y/s1600/imaV5ges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">If the world powers are not prepared to\ninsist that Iran change its behavior before a deal is signed, at the very least\nthey should insist that Iran change its behavior before a deal expires.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">If Iran changes its behavior, the\nrestrictions would be lifted. If Iran doesn't change its behavior, the\nrestrictions should not be lifted.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">If Iran wants to be treated like a normal\ncountry, let it act like a normal country.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">My friends, what about the argument that\nthere's no alternative to this deal, that Iran's nuclear know-how cannot be\nerased, that its nuclear program is so advanced that the best we can do is\ndelay the inevitable, which is essentially what the proposed deal seeks to do?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Well, nuclear know-how without nuclear\ninfrastructure doesn't get you very much. A racecar driver without a car can't\ndrive. A pilot without a plan can't fly. Without thousands of centrifuges, tons\nof enriched uranium or heavy water facilities, Iran can't make nuclear weapons.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Iran's nuclear program can be rolled back\nwell-beyond the current proposal by insisting on a better deal and keeping up\nthe pressure on a very vulnerable regime, especially given the recent collapse\nin the price of oil.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-81Gnh5UABE0/VPe0cP_RIHI/AAAAAAAA10g/IwCHDaYDdVc/s1600/doHTRwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"262\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-81Gnh5UABE0/VPe0cP_RIHI/AAAAAAAA10g/IwCHDaYDdVc/s1600/doHTRwnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Now, if Iran threatens to walk away from the\ntable -- and this often happens in a Persian bazaar -- call their bluff.\nThey'll be back, because they need the deal a lot more than you do.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">And by maintaining the pressure on Iran and\non those who do business with Iran, you have the power to make them need it\neven more.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">My friends, for over a year, we've been told\nthat no deal is better than a bad deal. Well, this is a bad deal. It's a very\nbad deal. We're better off without it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Now we're being told that the only\nalternative to this bad deal is war. That's just not true. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">The alternative to this bad deal is a much\nbetter deal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-hDMTMah6Oa8/VPe0Tjbxg8I/AAAAAAAA10Q/m8pQ6lqkExw/s1600/iE4mages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"211\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-hDMTMah6Oa8/VPe0Tjbxg8I/AAAAAAAA10Q/m8pQ6lqkExw/s1600/iE4mages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">A better deal that doesn't leave Iran with a\nvast nuclear infrastructure and such a short break-out time. A better deal that\nkeeps the restrictions on Iran's nuclear program in place until Iran's\naggression ends. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">A better deal that won't give Iran an easy\npath to the bomb. A better deal that Israel and its neighbors may not like, but\nwith which we could live, literally. And no country...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">... no country has a greater stake -- no\ncountry has a greater stake than Israel in a good deal that peacefully removes\nthis threat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Ladies and gentlemen, history has placed us\nat a fateful crossroads. We must now choose between two paths. One path leads\nto a bad deal that will at best curtail Iran's nuclear ambitions for a while,\nbut it will inexorably lead to a nuclear-armed Iran whose unbridled aggression\nwill inevitably lead to war. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">The second path, however difficult, could\nlead to a much better deal, that would prevent a nuclear-armed Iran, a\nnuclearized Middle East and the horrific consequences of both to all of\nhumanity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">You don't have to read Robert Frost to know.\nYou have to live life to know that the difficult path is usually the one less\ntraveled, but it will make all the difference for the future of my country, the\nsecurity of the Middle East and the peace of the world, the peace, we all\ndesire. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE) <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WOYAVBqb6Gk/VPe0LZqiSVI/AAAAAAAA10I/UrmyiWREvDs/s1600/imCVages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"295\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WOYAVBqb6Gk/VPe0LZqiSVI/AAAAAAAA10I/UrmyiWREvDs/s1600/imCVages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">My friend, standing up to Iran is not easy.\nStanding up to dark and murderous regimes never is. With us today is Holocaust\nsurvivor and Nobel Prize winner Elie Wiesel. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Elie, your life and work inspires to give\nmeaning to the words, \"never again.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">And I wish I could promise you, Elie, that\nthe lessons of history have been learned. I can only urge the leaders of the\nworld not to repeat the mistakes of the past.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR&nbsp;\nAPPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Not to sacrifice the future for the present;\nnot to ignore aggression in the hopes of gaining an illusory peace. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">But I can guarantee you this, the days when\nthe Jewish people remained passive in the face of genocidal enemies, those days\nare over.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">We are no longer scattered among the nations,\npowerless to defend ourselves. We restored our sovereignty in our ancient home.\nAnd the soldiers who defend our home have boundless courage. For the first time\nin 100 generations, we, the Jewish people, can defend ourselves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(&nbsp; HAJAAR\nAPPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">This is why -- this is why, as a prime\nminister of Israel, I can promise you one more thing: Even if Israel has to\nstand alone, Israel will stand.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">But I know that Israel does not stand alone.\nI know that America stands with Israel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR&nbsp;\nAPPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">I know that you stand with Israel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR&nbsp;\nAPPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">You stand with Israel, because you know that\nthe story of Israel is not only the story of the Jewish people but of the human\nspirit that refuses again and again to succumb to history's horrors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(HAJAAR APPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Facing me right up there in the gallery,\noverlooking all of us in this (inaudible) chamber is the image of Moses. Moses\nled our people from slavery to the gates of the Promised Land.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">And before the people of Israel entered the\nland of Israel, Moses gave us a message that has steeled our resolve for\nthousands of years. I leave you with his message today, (SPEAKING IN HEBREW),\n\"Be strong and resolute, neither fear nor dread them.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">My friends, may Israel and America always\nstand together, strong and resolute. May we neither fear nor dread the\nchallenges ahead. May we face the future with confidence, strength and hope.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">May God bless the state of Israel and may God\nbless the United States of America.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">(&nbsp; HAJAAR\nAPPLAUSE)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-aXCvQ8-TI-I/VPe0DVoCotI/AAAAAAAA10A/VOY03xY1ReY/s1600/ima8Kges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"339\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-aXCvQ8-TI-I/VPe0DVoCotI/AAAAAAAA10A/VOY03xY1ReY/s1600/ima8Kges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Thank you. Thank you very much. Thank you\nall. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">You're wonderful. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Thank you, America. Thank you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Cambria&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\">Thank you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ro-BFIe7yCE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"http://www.youtube.com/embed/ro-BFIe7yCE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b>Grace and peace !</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe width=\"320\" height=\"266\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Mm5FOVmiNWo/0.jpg\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Mm5FOVmiNWo?feature=player_embedded\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An unusually potent\nstorm system lashed India over the weekend, bringing copious rain across a\nlarge swathe of the country, from Kashmir to Kerala, in what Indian&nbsp; Met officials described as a rare occurrence\nfor this time of the year.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A day before that people in Kerala saw strange\nballs of light.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS THE WAY GOD\nMEANT IT TO BE . &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
