font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Earth's temperature\ncycles is related to warming and cooling phases of the sun, and affected by\ncyclic variations in the geometry of Earth's orbit about the sun, but they are certainly\nnot caused by modern man's trucks, tractors, trains, planes and power\nstations.&nbsp; ( humpless glutton &nbsp;cow methane FARTS \u2013 maybe !)&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-DBxOACG5t_A/VPcOsE6OEQI/AAAAAAAA1yk/EE8ZY6Tfa_o/s1600/methane-co2-balancyyue3-scale-290a.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Much of the deep ocean\nfloor is composed of basalt, some quite fresh and exposed in recent eras of\nvolcanism and crustal movements along the mid-ocean rifts.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Nni0Wdwo29Y/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"http://www.youtube.com/embed/Nni0Wdwo29Y?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Two main factors\ncontrol the amount of carbon dioxide that can be absorbed by sea water \u2013the\nconcentration of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere and the temperature of the\nsea water. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At today's\nconcentration of a minute 390 parts per million (ppm), the partial pressure of\ncarbon dioxide in the atmosphere is very tiny, but it plays a small part in\nforcing carbon dioxide into solution in the oceans. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the carbon dioxide\ncontent of the atmosphere increases for any reason (volcanoes, the biosphere or\nman's industry), more carbon dioxide will be absorbed by the sea water,\nproviding that nothing else changes in the sea at the same time. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carbon dioxide is very\nsoluble in cold water, but if that water warms up, the carbon dioxide is\nexpelled . Thus these two effects (increased pressure and increased\ntemperature) act in opposite directions, ie one counter-acting the effect of\nthe other. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As temperature changes\ndramatically on a daily and annual cycle, so does the movement of carbon\ndioxide between ocean and atmosphere Ocean temperatures clearly control the\nlarge seasonal swings in carbon dioxide in the atmosphere \u2013 the huge southern\noceans expel it in their summer and re-absorb it in their winter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Man's effect on the\nhuge deep oceans is ZILCH. &nbsp;There is no\ncredible evidence (except in SOLD OUT AND BRIBED computer models) that man's\nproduction of carbon dioxide could have a measureable effect on ocean pH or\nocean life.&nbsp; These sold out souls are\nCULTURAL TERRORISTS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Methane is a POTENT\ngreenhouse gas . , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>Nitrous oxide ( also known as laughing gas ) , is\nstable when emitted at ground level, but breaks down when it reaches the\nstratosphere to form other gases, called nitrogen oxides, that trigger\nozone-destroying reactions.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Does not Rothschild\ncontrolled IPCC know that the impact of 1 kilo of Nitrous oxide on warming the atmosphere\nis over 320 times that of 1 kilo of carbon dioxide? &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Nitrous oxide is a greenhouse\ngas that is 2.4 times more potent than carbon dioxide.</span></b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DtsrsKVNLuk/VPfbYBNDc2I/AAAAAAAA13c/yyrBB6EAGds/s1600/oxide15.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"364\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DtsrsKVNLuk/VPfbYBNDc2I/AAAAAAAA13c/yyrBB6EAGds/s1600/oxide15.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE HUMPLESS WESTERN COWS\nEAT OIL CAKES/ CORN LIKE GLUTTONS THE WHOLE DAY, FART POTENT GREENHOUSE GAS METHANE\n( CH4) THE WHOLE DAY, PRODUCE USLESS TOXIC A1 MILK AND THEIR OFFENSIVE SMELLING\nURINE/ DUNG EMITS NITROUS OXIDE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitrous oxide (N2O), is\na potent greenhouse gas that contributes to stratospheric ozone depletion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitrogen fertilizers\napplied to soils that grow crops to make biodiesel and ethanol emit nitrous\noxide, a potent and long-lasting greenhouse gas. &nbsp;&nbsp;You don\u2019t have to be a scientist to declare\nthat &nbsp;biodiesel gives out highest\ntailpipe emissions of nitrous and nitrogen oxides.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Biofuel cultivation\nrequires nitrogen based artificial fertilizers.. We have killed all our lakes\nin India due to nitrogen based fertilizers. Hypertrophic lakes are supersaturated\nin &nbsp;nitrogen. High levels of nitrogen &nbsp;in the water most often come from agricultural\nrunoff and lawns / golf courses.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Groundwater is being polluted mainly by\nnitrates. Nitrates come off urea used in lawn fertilisers. Nitrogen in\ncommercial fertilizer is particularly soluble to facilitate uptake by crops,\nbut this also makes it vulnerable to run-off after heavy rainfall, and to\nleaching to groundwater. Nitrogen is an important factor in causing eutrophication\n(oxygen depletion) of water bodies&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Excessive nitrate (NO3) in drinking water\ncan cause human and animal health problems, particularly for small babies. Excess\nnitrates decrease the ability of blood to carry vital oxygen through the body. Nitrate\nor nitrites in drinking water are associated with cancer in adults. Nitrate is\nreduced to nitrite in the gut and nitrite reacts with specific food breakdown\nproducts (amines) to form highly carcinogenic nitrosamines.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is a convoluted path to cancer, but is assuming\ngreater importance as nitrate in food and drinking water slowly increases\nworldwide. line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">When you open a\ncarbonated soda bottle, as soon as the seal is broken CO2 immediately fizzes\nout of solution because of the sudden pressure decrease and soon finds\nequilibrium with atmospheric pressure.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\nAs the liquid warms, the CO2 concentration rapidly drops and the soda\ngoes flat.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CO2 in solution near\nthe ocean surface becomes H2CO3 which then diffuses into the deep ocean where\nit combines with insoluble exposed metal carbonates such as limestone (CaCO3)\nto form a water soluble metal bicarbonate solution. &nbsp;The solubility product for this metal\nbicarbonate solution is highly temperature dependent. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Global-warming potential (GWP) is a relative\nmeasure of how much heat a greenhouse gas traps in the atmosphere. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 20 year GWP of\nmethane is 86, which means that if the same mass of methane and carbon dioxide\nwere introduced into the atmosphere, that methane will trap 86 times more heat\nthan the carbon dioxide over the next 20 years<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Humpless\nglutton cows fart too much methane.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-kakdVTb0LN4/VPkrflS5cvI/AAAAAAAA16k/qnrxh9ShLyY/s1600/6a00d83451bab869e200e54f24995n908834-800wi.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"432\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-kakdVTb0LN4/VPkrflS5cvI/AAAAAAAA16k/qnrxh9ShLyY/s1600/6a00d83451bab869e200e54f24995n908834-800wi.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carbon dioxide is a\nharmless trace gas that does not cause any sort of dangerous global\nwarming.&nbsp; Humans produce a miniscule\namount of the total carbon dioxide in the atmosphere, most of it by BREATHING (\nexhale ) . The rest comes naturally from the environment.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CO2 is essential for life.&nbsp; It is not a pollutant.&nbsp; Plants cannot grow without carbon\ndioxide.&nbsp; It is not a heating agent and\ndoes not warm the planet.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8SSUTNsrhL4/VPkv_zu1_pI/AAAAAAAA17U/H_k4X1-vOR4/s1600/imag8mes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"198\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8SSUTNsrhL4/VPkv_zu1_pI/AAAAAAAA17U/H_k4X1-vOR4/s1600/imag8mes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Humans and animals\nexhale carbon dioxide with every breath.&nbsp;\nExhaled air is rich in carbon dioxide, a waste product of cellular\nrespiration during the production of energy, which is stored as ATP. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Take\ntwo plastic buckets and in one place two inches of gravel / crushed shells in\nthe bottom. From any good hydroponics supplier purchase some soluble CO2\ntablets and a pH testing kit.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now\nfill both buckets with rain water and check the pH of both. Check the pH throughout this experiment and you will\nfind that no matter how much CO2 you add to the bucket with the gravel, it will\nalways be alkaline when you go back and test it. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CO2 does not hold in\nheat !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oceans regulate the\namount of CO2 in the air through absorption equilibrium !!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lwxwI-uz6og/VPFxhr2WMwI/AAAAAAAA1pg/5aSYR0ekmzQ/s1600/image9ms.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lwxwI-uz6og/VPFxhr2WMwI/AAAAAAAA1pg/5aSYR0ekmzQ/s1600/image9ms.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All chemical tankers\nhave at least one installed FWG which should be kept in a clean and efficient\nworking condition and be able to produce fresh water (FW) in quantities close\nto the rated capacity. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This can only be\nachieved if all components and associated equipment such as pumps and ejectors\nare kept in a good working condition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When there is a\npossibility of carrying wall wash cargoes the Chief engineer must monitor the\nchloride levels closely. &nbsp; As far as practicable all steam must be generated from\nFWG water , so as the quality of steam is good to reduce chlorides in cargo tanks .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During operation of\nFWG, Evaporator Treatment should be applied to prevent the formation of scale.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The vessel should in\nall circumstances, be able to produce sufficient FW whilst at sea, for her own\nconsumption. This can be monitored by using a reliable flow meter or consuming\nfrom another tank for a day.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ensure tank washings\nare not discharged in the same side of FWG intake.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the sea is having\nobvious contaminants like Molasses ( as is usual off west coast Nicaragua /\nSalvador )/&nbsp; palm oil&nbsp; washings ( usual in North sea ) , plankton etc shut off the FWG.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, as the\ntemperatures involved in the distillation process may not be high enough to\nkill all bacteria present in such water, the evaporators must not be used for\nmaking drinking or washing water in port, inland waters, estuaries or anywhere\nthere is a risk of generating contaminated water. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The evaporators may be\nused to produce distilled water for use in the boiler plant, should port/cargo\noperations deplete the distilled water stocks below a safe operating level.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Chief Engineer must\nnotify the Master in the event of excessive consumption of boiler or domestic\nwater. Live steaming can consume a lot of water.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cargo must not be shut\nout in order to carry an excess quantity of water.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All in the valley of\nDeath<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Forward, the\nLight Brigade!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Charge for the\nguns!\" he said:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Into the valley of\nDeath<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Rode the six hundred.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Forward, the\nLight Brigade!\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Was there a man\ndismay'd?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not tho' the soldier\nknew<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Someone had blunder'd:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Theirs not to make\nreply,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Theirs not to reason\nwhy,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Theirs but to do and\ndie:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Into the valley of\nDeath<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Rode the six hundred.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cannon to left of them,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Boldly they rode and\nwell,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sabring the gunners\nthere,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; ( carving out the state of Israel ). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/winston-churchill-henchman-or-hero-capt.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/winston-churchill-henchman-or-hero-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild started\nCommunism on the planet. line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">poet Lord Alfred Tennyson and a nurse Florence\nof Nightingale. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Of course Rothschild\nwill extract personal FAAYADA out of every such cooked up LIE.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">So what FAAYADA could\nbe have extracted out of the CHARGE OF THE LIGHT BRIGADE ?</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He converted the man in\ncharge of the lost battle , into a great British hero. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under any stretch of\nimagination, this DORK should have been court martialed and sacked , but hey,\nfor playing ball and scratching the slimy Rothschild back ( QUID PRO QUO ) he\nbecame a great British hero.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was responsible for\ngiving the fateful order during the Battle of Balaclava in October 1854 which\nled to the Light division commander, the Earl of Cardigan, leading the fateful\nCharge of the Light Brigade.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Field Marshal George Charles\nBingham, 3rd Earl of Lucan GCB was a Rothschild stooge and one of the most\nhated men in British and Irish history. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prior to this, Jews had\ndeclined to take the oath \"on the true faith of a Christian\" and\nhaving not been sworn in as required by statute, were refused voting rights\nalthough having been elected an MP. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crypto Jew George\nCharles Bingham proposed, by way of a compromise, that each House could decide\nand modify its own oath. The House of Lords, who had long opposed the admission\nof Jews, agreed to this. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; he became the first Jewish member of the House of Lords. Bribed Prime Minister Lord John Russell introduced a Jewish Disabilities Bill to remove the problem with the oath.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The loss of the Battle\nof Balaclava in October 1854, was made out to be some sort of miscommunication.&nbsp; The truth is that the Russians &nbsp;pasted the light brigade , who tuned tail and\nran for their lives.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the dead were actually POWs of the\nRussians . See there is a Russian account of this cowardly charge too.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;I have sailed with Crimean officers , I know !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The R historian bull is\nas follows.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">R stooge Field Marshal\nFitzRoy James Henry Somerset, 1st Baron Raglan, &nbsp;issued an order to R stooge George Bingham,\n3rd Earl of Lucan.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This man then issues\na relay order to his brother in law ( whom he hated ) Lieutenant General James\nThomas Brudenell, 7th Earl of Cardigan, KCB, to lead the fateful Charge of the\nLight Brigade ( see below ).&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QYcm-bZIGsY/VOi0jkZCm8I/AAAAAAAA1c0/2sfjqj2zY-M/s1600/Carddffigan.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QYcm-bZIGsY/VOi0jkZCm8I/AAAAAAAA1c0/2sfjqj2zY-M/s1600/Carddffigan.jpg\" width=\"305\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lieutenant General\nJames Thomas Brudenell, 7th Earl of Cardigan, KCB was NOT even on the scene of\nbattle. He was living it up on his luxury steam yacht Dryad in Balaclava harbor.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The part played by the\nbrigade was not great and, to avoid embarrassing the earl, it was not mentioned\nin the official account of the battle forwarded to London.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 8 February, at a speech in his home town of\nNorthampton, he went even further, describing how he had shared the privations\nof his men by living the \"whole time in a common tent\" and how, after\nthe charge, he had rallied his troops and pursued the fleeing enemy\nartillerymen as far as the Tchernaya river\u2014all bull of the first order.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">R stooge Cardigan was\nable to enjoy many months of adulation before his LIE was exhumed and nailed .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sill on R\u2019s\nrecommendation he was made Inspector-General of Cavalry, the government\nrecommended him for the Order of the Garter. The Queen made him a knight in the\nOrder of the Bath. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-diGEPXnbWTw/VOjIxOpws6I/AAAAAAAA1dU/AwPsNlwUnbA/s1600/bbo_da_205g8fe12_large.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"456\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-diGEPXnbWTw/VOjIxOpws6I/AAAAAAAA1dU/AwPsNlwUnbA/s1600/bbo_da_205g8fe12_large.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">R media feted him. R\ncontrolled traders profited from his fame, sold pictures depicting his role in\nthe charge &nbsp;The \"cardigan\", a\nknitted waistcoat supposedly as worn by the earl on campaign, became\nfashionable and thousands were &nbsp;sold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE IS A SAYING THAT\nDEAD MEN TELL NO TALES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE ENTIRE BLAME WAS\nPINNED ON A DEAD MAN CAPTAIN LOUIS EDWARD &nbsp;NOLAN ( WHO WAS NOT R ROYALTY ) WHO FOUGHT\nHARD AND WAS A COMPETENT SOLDIER . &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6w4CElLwLII/VOi7Rfojy6I/AAAAAAAA1dE/G4pVqJSWBdU/s1600/220px-Louis-nolan-VGwatercolour.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6w4CElLwLII/VOi7Rfojy6I/AAAAAAAA1dE/G4pVqJSWBdU/s1600/220px-Louis-nolan-VGwatercolour.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A veteran of several\nhard campaigns in India, Capt Nolan is unusual in the hierarchy of his day for\nhaving acquired his commission through merited promotion as opposed to Rothschild\nsponsored purchase .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt Nolan, was the first casualty of the charge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">R stooge George\nBingham, 3rd Earl of Lucan pretended to limp and said that two horses were\nkilled under him\u2014all bull.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The English\nfought with astounding bravery, and when we approached their dismounted and\nwounded men, even these refused to surrender and continued to fight till the\nground was soaked with their blood.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OH YES\u2014 WE ALL HAVE\nSPROUTED LONG EARS !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BBBBRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAYYYYYYYY\n!<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">The whole CHARGE affair had lasted no more than 18\nminutes- never mind the bull .</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now let me digress to\nFlorence of Nightingale.&nbsp; She was there\nnursing at the Battle of Balaclava.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This woman was very\nattractive with a slim figure and she was from a very rich family. She was a\nhealer of the Indian tradition which later was known as Reiki.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jesus Christ\ncame to Kerala to learn Reiki.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/reiki-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/reiki-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In one of her high\nsociety parties she met Madama Blavatsy and was drawn to Hinduism and\nspirituality.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">She wanted to come to India many times on Blavatsky\u2019s invitation ,\nbut Rothschild knowing her spiritual inclination did NOT allow her .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She read the Bhagawad\nGita daily . &nbsp;She was often critical of\norganised religions like Christianity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She loved to read the 6000\nyear old Indian epic Mahabharata ( presented her by Mr Jowett ) again and\nagain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Florence was a healer .\n&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because of her mystique, aristocracy &nbsp;and charisma, &nbsp;she always got what she wanted. &nbsp;All were drawn to her magnetism.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her father,\nWilliam Edward Nightingale, was an extremely wealthy landowner, and the family\nmoved in the highest circles of English society which included Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the British soldiers\nhad venereal disease which they picked up in the male and female brothels of\nIstanbul. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yet she showed NO sense\nof revulsion and would treat them like her own children and the soldiers were\neternally grateful to her.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">She was OVER sincere\nand conscientious &nbsp;in her work . There is\na secret here, which I will reveal today. &nbsp;She suffered from OCD and would check on her\npatients again and again even after midnight with a lamp.&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The soldiers called\nher the \u2018lady with the lamp\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OCD sufferers have high\nattention to detail, avoidance of risk, careful planning and a greater sense of\nresponsibility and will take time to make decisions, as their thinking\nprocesses are lateral.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She also helped the\nwounded soldiers on the battlefield and they called her \u2018Mother Seacole\u2019 for\nher bravery. On return to Britain she wrote a book about her life called The\nWonderful Adventures of Mrs Seacole in Many Lands.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On return to Britain in\n1857 she was deemed a heroine for her work to reduce the death rate at the\nhospital and became the first ever woman to receive the Order of Merit as a\nreward for her work. &nbsp;She asked\nRothschild for a passage to India on his ships in 1857 but was denied.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A print\nof the jewel awarded to Nightingale by Queen Victoria, for her services to the\nsoldiers in the war.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Graceful and feminine she\nshowed NIL sexual interest in the young sex starved soldiers while treating\ntheir genitals , many speculated that she was a lesbian- a MOST FOUL\nallegation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They all point out to\none mangy line in a memoir which stated ( sic ) , \"I have lived and slept\nin the same beds with English Countesses and Prussian farm women. No woman has\nexcited passions among women more than I have\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Some scholars of Nightingale's life believe\nthat she remained chaste for her entire life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Christians angry\nwith her Hindu spirituality injected poison \u201c Nightingale's achievements in the\nCrimean War were exaggerated by the media at the time, to satisfy the public's\nneed for a hero.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She was offered burial\nin Westminster Abbey ( meant for kings ) but she declined it.&nbsp; She wanted to be cremated.&nbsp; However when she died her ashes were&nbsp; buried in the graveyard at St. Margaret\nChurch in East Wellow, Hampshire.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1883, Nightingale\nwas awarded the Royal Red Cross by Queen Victoria. In 1904, she was appointed a\nLady of Grace of the Order of St John (LGStJ). In 1907, she became the first\nwoman to be awarded the Order of Merit. In the following year she was given the\nHonorary Freedom of the City of London.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her birthday is now celebrated as\nInternational CFS Awareness Day.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The real reason why the\nsoldiers loved her was that she did NOT record the veneral diseases \u2013 as the\nsoldiers would NOT get the salary .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those days only if you died on the battle\nfield your family &nbsp;got compensation- NOT\nif you died of syphilis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Rothschild paid and used\nthousands &nbsp;of desperate Irish immigrant\nmen on both sides of the American Civil War 1861-1865 as officers, volunteers\nand draftees.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Most Irish-Americans were\nmad by Rothschild and his Free Masons to settle in the northern, American\nstates and were thus called up to serve when the southern states seceded and\nformed the Confederacy in 1861.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>On March 3, 1863, Rothschild got Congress to pass\nthe Enrollment Act which required single men age 20 to 45 and married men up to\nage 35 to register for the draft. &nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Even\nthen the NOT SO BRIGHT Irish man did NOT smell a dirty trick.&nbsp; -- that American citizenship also made\nimmigrants liable for the draft.</b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild made sure\nthat the black slaves were excluded from this same draft. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This made these escaped slaves run in\nthousands to the North creating competition for the NOT SO BRIGHT Irish </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">in the labor market.</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Aided covertly by the\nwhite police the DIM WIT &nbsp;Irish started\nstabbing the poor confused &nbsp;blacks on the\nstreets.&nbsp; More than 2150 people &nbsp;died ( 9800 wounded ) in the draft riots in New York City which\nmakes this the most deadly civil insurrection in American history.<o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Rothschild banksters &nbsp;financed the Civil War. By the end of the war,\nmore than 485,000 soldiers, sailors and militia (mostly DIMWIT Irish Immigrants)\nhad enlisted from New York State, which was the most populous state at the time</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: White Irish thugs giving the treatment to the poor blacks -with white police looking the other way &nbsp;..</span><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">&nbsp;</span></b></span><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Initially intended to\nexpress anger at the draft, the Irish protests turned into a race riot, with\nwhite rioters, exclusively Irish immigrants, attacking blacks wherever they\ncould find them-driving the blacks to Brooklyn ghettos . This is true naked history getting exhumed &nbsp;..&nbsp;</span></span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-AZIpxv1ZOHE/VOnDidC7ddI/AAAAAAAA1fI/uXS1tzfhAS0/s1600/draft_riots_uklirish_hiw_large.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"342\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-AZIpxv1ZOHE/VOnDidC7ddI/AAAAAAAA1fI/uXS1tzfhAS0/s1600/draft_riots_uklirish_hiw_large.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">In March 1863, white\nemployers had hired blacks, with whom Irish men refused to work, as\nlongshoremen. An Irish mob attacked two hundred blacks who were working on the\ndocks, while other rioters went into the streets in search of \"all the\nnegro porters, cartmen and laborers ...\" to attempt to remove all evidence\nof a black and interracial social life from the area near the docks. White\ndockworkers attacked and destroyed brothels, dance halls, boarding houses, and\ntenements that catered to blacks. Mobs stripped the clothing off the white\nowners of these businesses.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">We in Kerala know\nRothschild engineered Mopah Rebellion ( Khilafat ) in Kerala using stooge\nGandhi, driving a permanent wedge between Hindus and Muslims who co-existed for hundreds of years forever .</span></span></span></b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;</span><br /><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-RgEH3jhqXiA/VOnAJd_v3dI/AAAAAAAA1e8/9joVQNQ2lwY/s1600/NYbhuuDraft.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-RgEH3jhqXiA/VOnAJd_v3dI/AAAAAAAA1e8/9joVQNQ2lwY/s1600/NYbhuuDraft.gif\" width=\"380\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>The Northern states\nremained loyal to the United States government, which was led by President\nAbraham Lincoln. Irish-Americans living in the Union states often formed their\nown regiments, notably the 69th New York State Volunteers. The Volunteers flew\na green flag with a golden harp on it, symbolizing Ireland.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>The green flag was\ncarried in addition to the normal regimental and national colours, making the\n69th probably the only regiment to carry five colors into battle during the\nAmerican Civil War.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Seven Union generals\nwere Irish-born while an estimated 161,000 Irish-Americans fought for the Union\nduring the war.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;At the\n1862 Battle of Fredericksburg, the Union Irish Brigade FED WITH LIQUOR INFUSED HOT\nPOTATOES charged up Marye's Heights, suffering 44% casualties</b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Rothschild has funded\nand armed every fight since the Battle of Waterloo. Although significantly\nfewer Irish lived in the Confederate States of America, six Confederate\ngenerals were Irish-born. <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Units such as the\nCharleston Irish Volunteers attracted Confederate Irish-Americans in South\nCarolina, the 24th Georgia Volunteer Infantry followed General Thomas Reade\nRootes Cobb, while Irish Tennesseans could join the 10th Tennessee Infantry\nRegiment. <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">The 5th Missouri\nInfantry, commanded by Colonel Joseph Kelly, was called \"the Sons of\nErin.\", or Kelly's Irish Brigade. Although this unit was only a regiment,\nit is sometimes dubbed \"The Confederate Irish Brigade.\" The Louisiana\nTigers, first raised by Major Chatham Roberdeau Wheat, had a large number of\nIrish American members.</b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-decoration: none;\">Taslima Rushdie</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/02/sophie-scholl-white-rose-group-germany.html?showComment=1424636062793#c3648303022322292557\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">February 23, 2015 at 1:44 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_344MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nHello Mudaliar!<br />\n<br />\nHistory writing is a neglected aspect of nation building even in this 21st century. Even today, we make our opinions based on news reports, TV shows, books, autobiographies etc. We don't have authentic history books even for the post-1947 era. Whatever available information is scattered, deliberately hidden in the name of secrecy, and even distorted to suit a particular ideology or political party.<br />\n<br />\nIn addition, even now, we depend on foreign experts to understand our historical events, which can never be free of bias and malice. Their analysis and interpretation is widely acclaimed and propagated without any debate. Such experts have free hand even in commenting about our religion, culture, govt policies, minorities etc etc.<br />\n<br />\nThere was a widespread perception about MMS being a puppet PM, but there was no proof. There is a popular misconception that AK49 is an honest politician, but there are contrary extreme views about him based on his modus operandi. We say Gandhiji is our father of nation who single-handedly gave us freedom, but there is enough evidence to prove that he doesn't deserve this description. Ambedkar is a god for many, but he is a villain in others' opinion.<br />\n<br />\nCan there be any solution to such extreme views?<br />\n<br />\nLike the census, history writing should be the government's responsibility. Our govt should form a committee of eminent historians from different universities to write contemporary history. This authentic contemporary history should be published after every 10-years (just like census). This history can be debated in every available forum and even in parliament, but the final draft should be the most authentic version of history. Can we dream of such a thing even now???<br />\n<br />\nWe don't need any proof to believe Captain's blog. We agree with his perception, as it helps us to connect dots like never before.<br />\n<br />\n... JUST TO PLEASE HIS ZIONIST FRIENDS . , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The British landlords\nas well as the Irish landlords were in debt to the R controlled Jew bankers and\nhad the choice of either paying their debts or having their farms and estates\nconfiscated. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even as their own Irish\nfarm workers were starving to death, these absentee landlords exported food\nfrom Ireland to sell in Great Britain. &nbsp;It\nis a historical fact, that during the entire Irish Potato Famine, Ireland was a\nnet exporter of food (all foods, that is, except potatoes). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They had enough food to\nfeed their people, but they exported it to sell so that they could pay the R\nbanksters interest on the loans. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Potatoes grown on even\na small plot can feed an entire family and are a STAPLE nutritional source. &nbsp;So, the Irish poor became dependent upon the\npotatoes they grew on their little plots even while they labored for the\nlandlords on the big estates. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Potatoes were\nnutritious and easy to cook, and they could be fed to pigs and cattle and fowl.\nAnd families did not need a plough to grow potatoes. All they needed was a\nspade, and they could grow potatoes in wet ground and on mountain sides where\nno other kinds of plants could be cultivated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-nDxstxMA7Bc/VO8Q6QG1OZI/AAAAAAAA1js/ZajiqdeMs4g/s1600/imag7ukes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Potatoes became such an\nimportant and basic food for the Irish poor that when Irish immigrant women\nwere seeking work in America, they had trouble finding jobs as cooks because\nall they knew how to cook was potatoes in its variety of dishes.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Knowing their sorrow of affairs back home, Indian donated\ngenerously. Most of the money were donated by poor Hindu people, with Indian kings\nand Indian princes chipping in.&nbsp;\nRothschild controlled the collections. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Within a few months,\nthe Calcutta Committee itself had raised 20,000 pounds for the relief of the\nIrish poor \u2013where this money went, is anybody\u2019s guess.</span> <br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Queen Victoria is\nremembered as \u201cThe Famine Queen\u201d for allegedly only giving 5 pounds to help the\nstarving Irish. &nbsp;Now the royalty struck Limeys\ntry to fudge this and try to make her a very generous donor- so what else is\nnew..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Calcutta committee was headed\nby English judge Chief Justice Sir Lawrence Peel.&nbsp; On his retirement in November 1855 a statue\nof him was erected in Eden Gardens Calcutta .&nbsp;\n</span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From 1857 he was\na director of the British East India Company<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Create a problem and pretend to solve that problem \u2013 called HEGELIAN\nDIALECTIC . &nbsp;In this case it was mass\nmigration to America for cheap white labour.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/hegelian-dialectic-cancer-on-this.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/hegelian-dialectic-cancer-on-this.html</a><o:p></o:p><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But while the potato\ncrop failed and most Irish were starving, many wealthy absentee landlords who\nowned large farms had large crops of oats and grain that they were exporting to\nEngland. &nbsp;The poor in Ireland could not\nafford to buy food and were starving. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This famine was DELIBERATE \u2013 the not so\nbright Irish must know this today.&nbsp; They\nwill NOT get the truth from R controlled media.&nbsp;\nDuring times of famine you do NOT export food, this is rule No 1 .</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In July 1847, almost 3\nmillion starving Irish people were lining up to get a \u201cvile soup\u201d or a \u201cstirabout\u201d\nporridge consisting of Indian maize and Indian rice shipped out of India for\nsome amount of succor.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6_9IK0hh54U/VO8S2_fNmgI/AAAAAAAA1kQ/kxFi-Ts910s/s1600/Haters-7mGonna-Hate%2C-Potatoes-Gonna-Potate-Crewneck.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
