line-height: 150%;\">The Thamudis gave a\ndamn to the warning and instead told Prophet Saleh to summon a pregnant\nshe-camel from the back of a mountain. &nbsp;TEE HEEEE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And so, a pregnant\nshe-camel was sent to the people from the back of the mountain by Allah, as\nproof of Saleh's divine mission. However, only a minority heeded his words. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The non-believers\nkilled the sacred camel instead of caring for it as they were told, and its\ncalf ran back to the mountain where it had come from, screaming. &nbsp;MAAAA BAAAAAAA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Thamudis were given\nthree days before their punishment was to take place, still they gave two\nhoots.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Prophet Saleh and\nthe believers left the city, but the PAGAN idol worshiping Thamudis were punished by Allah \u2014their\nsouls leaving their lifeless bodies in the midst of an earthquake and lightning\nblasts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ever since the site has\nearned a reputation as a cursed place .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BAAP RE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Saleh</span> </span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">of the name\nrefers to the Koranic prophet Saleh.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 115%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">Mada</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"> means ASURA in Hindu mythology.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Koran places\nsettlement of the area by the Thamud people after Noah but before Moses, which\ncan be interpreted as 3500 BC&nbsp; . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For the Biblic big bang\nwas 4004 BC&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>TEEE HEEEEEE .</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-N7TC4sIOoYM/VN7tRBPo7wI/AAAAAAAA1Uo/q1nZudv0Jvg/s1600/imageyuuiCAGB2H27.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"235\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-N7TC4sIOoYM/VN7tRBPo7wI/AAAAAAAA1Uo/q1nZudv0Jvg/s1600/imageyuuiCAGB2H27.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-yVgifbdA-zY/VN7tiErXd5I/AAAAAAAA1Uw/_lGK7Dgyuwo/s1600/ussher-cyhjjharffet-top.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-yVgifbdA-zY/VN7tiErXd5I/AAAAAAAA1Uw/_lGK7Dgyuwo/s1600/ussher-cyhjjharffet-top.jpg\" width=\"550\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-se6T2XCHiZg/VN7uQRd0HlI/AAAAAAAA1U8/8mDxOsSeCWE/s1600/b49a1-saganun5iverseea.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-se6T2XCHiZg/VN7uQRd0HlI/AAAAAAAA1U8/8mDxOsSeCWE/s1600/b49a1-saganun5iverseea.jpg\" width=\"397\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But the fact remains\nthat this place flourished in 4300 BC- during the times of Ramayana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2008 UNESCO\nproclaimed Mada'in Saleh as a site of patrimony, becoming Saudi Arabia's first\nWorld Heritage Site<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Petra ( Jordan) being\nthe capital of the Nabataean kingdom. The Nabataeans of Arab origin that became\nrich by their monopoly in being MIDDLEMEN on the trade of incense and spices\nfrom Kerala .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Incense and Aloevera came\nfrom Kerala and Socotra. Myrrh and Frankincense found in Socotra , was in great\ndemand in old Palestine. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 7000 BC , India\nruled from Palisthan ( Palestine ) to Urals to Vietnam. Before 7000 BC India\nruled the whole world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/aloe-vera-socotra-vikramaditya-petra.html\" style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/aloe-vera-socotra-vikramaditya-petra.html</a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">The Nabataean deity <b><span style=\"color: red;\">DUSHARA</span></b>\nis called \u201cLord of the Mountain\u201d. </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>DUSHARA ( DUSANA ) A\nMIGHTY ASURA ( Mada) WARRIOR WAS HALF BROTHER OF RAVANA. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Surpanakha was Dusara\u2019s\nblood brother \u2013 he other blood brother is KHARA.&nbsp; She was the daughter of Ravanas step mother.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Lakshman insulted\nprincess Surpenekha, she went running to her brother Khara ( &nbsp;king &nbsp;of\nDandakaranya ) who sent his brother prince Dusara with General Trishira along\nan huge army of 14000 asuras to fight Lakshmana. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Rama saw them\napproaching he sent Sita and Lakshmana to a safe place. He kept aside his bow\nKodanda and took out his GANDHARVA ASTRA which could shoot thousands of\nmissiles at the same time..&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-jO9Yo181edM/VN9fTPE4A3I/AAAAAAAA1Vc/tMMK9LZ_ruI/s1600/i1dmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"253\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-jO9Yo181edM/VN9fTPE4A3I/AAAAAAAA1Vc/tMMK9LZ_ruI/s1600/i1dmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mantra\npassword was known only to Lord Shiva and Lord Rama. &nbsp;Dusara fell with both his arms sliced off by\nnew moon crescent astras.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Khara the other brother\njoined the battle when he heard that his brother fell.&nbsp; In this battle Rama was hit and his armour\nbroke. He strung his Vaishnava bow given to him by Maharishi Agastya and killed\nhim.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6F9mCIGCOZo/VN9e37M-B1I/AAAAAAAA1VU/7Y6tLcntqac/s1600/khara-dusha8kna-ramayan-desibantu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"462\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6F9mCIGCOZo/VN9e37M-B1I/AAAAAAAA1VU/7Y6tLcntqac/s1600/khara-dusha8kna-ramayan-desibantu.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rama decimated every\nasura except &nbsp;Akampana, who fled to Lanka\nto narrate his eye witness account to King Ravana who was terribly upset.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Surpanakha was the youngest\nchild of Rishi Vishrava and his second wife, Kaikesi.&nbsp; Her name was Meenakshi ( Diksha ) at birth.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She was more beautiful than her mother\nKaikesi and her grandmother Thataka had been before he.&nbsp; Surpanakha married asura Viddhyjiva of the Kalkeya\nclan. &nbsp; She was more beautiful than Sita but less beautiful than Mandodari, the wife of Ravana .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-igaHywog9Ik/VN9f6F_8MgI/AAAAAAAA1Vk/F0k6w1KjrkA/s1600/sanjeeda-s8kheikh-as-surpanakha-in-life-ok-s-ram-39085.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-igaHywog9Ik/VN9f6F_8MgI/AAAAAAAA1Vk/F0k6w1KjrkA/s1600/sanjeeda-s8kheikh-as-surpanakha-in-life-ok-s-ram-39085.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once in battle Ravana inadvertently\nkilled his own &nbsp;brother in law ( friendly\nfire ) .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Widowed Surpanakha left Lanka\nand was roaming around in Kerala among her blood relatives her mind numbed in grief , when\nshe saw handsome Rama and fell in love with him -love at first sight .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-M4rS7hyuS4U/VN9d__vEdHI/AAAAAAAA1VM/kI57tF9mtdk/s1600/Pretty_Sanjejgbeda5412.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"448\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-M4rS7hyuS4U/VN9d__vEdHI/AAAAAAAA1VM/kI57tF9mtdk/s1600/Pretty_Sanjejgbeda5412.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ravana was loved by both\nShiva and Vishnu. &nbsp;&nbsp;Ravan was Vishnu\u2019s\nbeloved gatekeeper at Vaikunta, Jaya in his previous birth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/09/king-ravana-of-ramayana-hero-or-villian.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/09/king-ravana-of-ramayana-hero-or-villian.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0W1T4SaOSYw/VN9h9IxsOCI/AAAAAAAA1Vw/TDgKfgUvn0k/s1600/sita-requests-ram7gbb-to-fetch-illusory-golden-deer-CH74_l.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"476\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0W1T4SaOSYw/VN9h9IxsOCI/AAAAAAAA1Vw/TDgKfgUvn0k/s1600/sita-requests-ram7gbb-to-fetch-illusory-golden-deer-CH74_l.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Asura have been\nworshipped as Gods.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shukracharya the mentor\nof asura king Mahabali of Kerala was a god in the whole of middle east. Friday\n( Shukravar ) is still a holiday in these areas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/why-kerala-does-not-celebrate-diwali-or.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/why-kerala-does-not-celebrate-diwali-or.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Maharishi Shukracharya advising asura king Mahabali of Kerala- NOT to trust the brahmin midget ( Vishnu avatar Vamana )&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-OEqWtFgFJL4/VN9iQxBBD_I/AAAAAAAA1V4/m96lU3I9VtQ/s1600/ima8bn%2Bges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-OEqWtFgFJL4/VN9iQxBBD_I/AAAAAAAA1V4/m96lU3I9VtQ/s1600/ima8bn%2Bges.jpg\" width=\"243\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shukracharya is also\ngod of the Parsis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/shukracharya-is-ahura-mazda-god-of.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/shukracharya-is-ahura-mazda-god-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brihaspati the mentor\nof the Devas , was the god of the whole of Europe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/thor-zeus-marduk-brihaspati-and-jupiter.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/thor-zeus-marduk-brihaspati-and-jupiter.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE CRUSADES WERE\nANCIENT DNA PROGRAMMED ENMITY BETWEEN THE FOLLOWERS OF SHUKRACHARYA AND\nBRIHASPATI.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Below: This planet's first LOVE JIHAD - Maharishi Brihaspati's son Kacha seducing Devyani the daughter of bitter rival Maharishi Shukracharya .</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8_vlERiji04/VN9ixdRzH4I/AAAAAAAA1WA/GzJ7wsqKMYQ/s1600/01K6ch.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"231\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8_vlERiji04/VN9ixdRzH4I/AAAAAAAA1WA/GzJ7wsqKMYQ/s1600/01K6ch.JPG\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maya Danava who build\nthe Indraprasta palace hall for Yuddhistira was Ravana's father in law. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-V9c7hqSDJ4o/VN9hi5Ft_OI/AAAAAAAA1Vs/WwD-tepbMXI/s1600/day5htja.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-V9c7hqSDJ4o/VN9hi5Ft_OI/AAAAAAAA1Vs/WwD-tepbMXI/s1600/day5htja.jpg\" width=\"577\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maya Danava was the god of the entire\nAmericas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Below: &nbsp;Bonus-- Indian dance is graceful -- unlike western dance --- tip toeing , leg splaying showing prime ass , rotating on the dirty floor, acrobatics, jumping like jack asses, cart wheeling, rope climbing , trapeze, gymnastics - whatever&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/TVDt8bNEAtg/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"http://www.youtube.com/embed/TVDt8bNEAtg?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shooting arrows at\nRavana by Rama on DUSSHERA was started by the British. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dusera is more about\nRama single handedly vanquishing the 14000 strong mighty asura army led by\nDusera the brother of Surpanekha .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vijayadashami is about\nShakti ( Durga wife of Shiva ) killing Mashishasura after an epic battle of 10\ndays . &nbsp;This has NOTHING to do with Rama or Ravana.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;Rama\nis just an earthly avatar of Vishnu.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-itjNgDr9fK4/VN95DUVUkcI/AAAAAAAA1WQ/iZoa4U_SnfI/s1600/mahishas5ghaur-killed-222x300.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-itjNgDr9fK4/VN95DUVUkcI/AAAAAAAA1WQ/iZoa4U_SnfI/s1600/mahishas5ghaur-killed-222x300.jpg\" width=\"473\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>Vijayadashami\nwas celebrated in Kerala much before the Ramayana war.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/navratri-festival-durga-puja-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/navratri-festival-durga-puja-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We in Kerala celebrate Ayudha\nPuja.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/ayudha-puja-9th-day-of-navratri.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/ayudha-puja-9th-day-of-navratri.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Goddess Shakti (\nDurga&nbsp; )is the mother of the universe and\nis the KINETIC power behind the work of creation, preservation, and destruction\nof the world.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/07/saundarya-lahari-by-adi-shankaracharya.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/07/saundarya-lahari-by-adi-shankaracharya.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 106 AD, the Nabatean\nkingdom was annexed by the contemporary Roman Empire. The Hejaz, which\nencompasses Hegra, became part of the Roman province of Arabia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Islamists have\ndeleted the PAGAN ( Hindu ) history from the decline of the Roman Empire until\nthe emergence of Islam .&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;However Ibn Batuta had left a good account\nof these areas.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/brahma-and-sarawati-abraham-and-sara.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/brahma-and-sarawati-abraham-and-sara.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ibn Batuta came to my\nhometown Calicut only because he knew the Hindu history of Bernice, Mecca ,\nPetra, Madain Saleh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/ibn-battuta-at-calicut-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/ibn-battuta-at-calicut-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chinese Admiral Zheng\nHe came to Calicut , and left records of Mecca and Hindu history before Islam.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/chinese-admiral-zheng-he-in-calicut.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/chinese-admiral-zheng-he-in-calicut.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was HUGE trade\nbetween Rome and Calicut since the conquest of Egypt by the Romans, according\nto the historian Strabo&nbsp; . 150 large\nRoman ships were involved in this trade from Bernice ( Egypt port in Red sea ).\n&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Romans had a naval\nbase for catching pirate ships , to secure the maritime route based at Eudaemon\n( Aden ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Roman emperor &nbsp;Diocletian pushed the spice trade from Kerala as\nit was very profitable for him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/kurushipally-calicut-st-georges-shrine.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/kurushipally-calicut-st-georges-shrine.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the link above you\ncan see my picture at Diocletan\u2019s palace.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white historian has\ngiven the credit for \u201cdiscovering\u201d &nbsp;Petra\nto the Swiss explorer Johann Ludwig Burckhardt in 1812. Same way an Englishman &nbsp;Charles Montagu Doughty, was given the credit\nfor &nbsp;Mada'in Saleh&nbsp; .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a temple in Jabal\nIthlib dedicated to the Nabatean deity Dushara \u2013also called Lord of the PAGAN Temple..\n&nbsp;Majority of the ruins are still covered\nby sand and the Islamists prefer they remain buried.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/--Z1vqib0mgg/VOGTQKcQ_EI/AAAAAAAA1YI/AYyyaTdpS0g/s1600/rt770.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/--Z1vqib0mgg/VOGTQKcQ_EI/AAAAAAAA1YI/AYyyaTdpS0g/s1600/rt770.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>Below: Jabal Ithlib ( temple of diety Dushara ) Where ever there is a hollow cave- &nbsp;multiarmed Hindus idols existed-- they were all chiseled out.</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-uLFYOsIfpqw/VOGQb8xuGXI/AAAAAAAA1X8/wtalpUl7yfM/s1600/01A7bbnNJW15.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-uLFYOsIfpqw/VOGQb8xuGXI/AAAAAAAA1X8/wtalpUl7yfM/s1600/01A7bbnNJW15.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Below: Goddess Allat of Madain Saleh and Petra .</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_WRfrJJbKps/VOGUZdmR2jI/AAAAAAAA1YU/9z8pUDFezAI/s1600/Allathjj-3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_WRfrJJbKps/VOGUZdmR2jI/AAAAAAAA1YU/9z8pUDFezAI/s1600/Allathjj-3.jpg\" width=\"466\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-biIt0wAzIHI/VOGUy-QbPVI/AAAAAAAA1Yc/KZpLRz2mB-8/s1600/imafthjges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-biIt0wAzIHI/VOGUy-QbPVI/AAAAAAAA1Yc/KZpLRz2mB-8/s1600/imafthjges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Below: Multi armed Trinity - PAGAN Goddess Allat .</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6OyFyVrrxWo/VOGU_BS4tsI/AAAAAAAA1Yk/nQqPN5tfML0/s1600/A7hllat-2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6OyFyVrrxWo/VOGU_BS4tsI/AAAAAAAA1Yk/nQqPN5tfML0/s1600/A7hllat-2.jpg\" width=\"198\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alexander the Great\u2019s ,\nhistorian Hieronymus of Cardia had recorded that the Nabataeans leading a Spartan\nvegetarian life. &nbsp;The real cause of the\nsuccess of the Nabataeans, however, was control over much of the spice trade.\nFrankincense, myrrh, and other spices .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nNabataeans built their empire as the middlemen of Kerala spices.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;Hegra was a crossroads where the\nmajor north-south incense ( aloe vera ) route intersected a road from the Red\nSea to the Persian Gulf&nbsp;.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nabateans are also referred\nto as Thamuds.&nbsp; The Qur'an mentions\nThamud in Surah Al-A'raf in the context of several prophets who warned their\npeople of coming judgement. Verse 74 says of Thamud, \"and remember when he\nmade you successors after Aad and settled you in the land, and you take for\nyourselves palaces from its plains and carve from the mountains, homes\".\nThis refers to the rock-cut tombs of Mada'in Saleh (the Cities of Saleh).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Madain Salih &nbsp;is situated almost 750 km north from Jeddah, &nbsp;300 km from Medina.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muslims love to say\nthat the Thamud were warned by the prophet \u1e62ale\u1e25 to stop worshiping idols and\nto worship only the true god Allah.&nbsp; But\nthe Thamud stubbornly refused and as a result were annihilated either by a\nthunderbolt .</span> <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prophet Saleh was saved\nfrom this torment along with those who believed. He turned away from the dead\ndisbelievers saying: \"O my people! I have indeed conveyed to you the\nMessage of my Lord, and have given you good advice but you like not good\nadvisers!\" (Al-A'raf, 7:79). Subsequently, he and the believers left the\ndesolated area.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Petra in Jordan has\nbeen declared to be one of the world wonders in 2007.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The Nabateans developed oasis agriculture, digging\nwells and rainwater harvesting tanks in the rock and carving multiarmed Hindu idols\nin the sandstone outcrops. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Similar structures were\nfeatured in other Nabatean settlements, ranging from southern Syria to the\nnorth, going south to the Negev, and down to the immediate area of Hejaz.</span>\n<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Madain Saleh, extends\nover some 13 kilometers but most of it is under the desert.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\nLIKE THE PAKISTANIS , THE MUSLIM ARABIANS ARE ASHAMED OF THEIR PAST -<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nWHAT A DISGRACE !<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BABRI MASJID, QUTAB\nMINAR, TAJ MAHAL WERE ALL HINDU STRUCTURES .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/qutab-minar-was-dhruv-stambh-vishnu.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/qutab-minar-was-dhruv-stambh-vishnu.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I had taken pictures\nfrom Qutab Minar of \u201csuspected\u201d Hindus Motifs and verified them with Hindus motifs\nin major ancient Hindus temples. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mecca Kaaba was\noriginally a Shiva temple.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2009/07/vedic-practises-in-mecca-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2009/07/vedic-practises-in-mecca-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Let me quote Wikipedia\n( who has done everything to destroy Hinduism ) &nbsp;:--</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE :&nbsp; Before the rise of Islam the Ka'aba, and\nMecca (previously known as Bakkah), were revered as a sacred sanctuary and was\na site of pilgrimage.[1] &nbsp;At the time of\nMuhammad (AD 570\u2013632), his tribe the Quraysh was in charge of the Kaaba, which\nwas at that time a shrine containing hundreds of idols representing Arabian\ntribal gods and other religious figures. Muhammad earned the enmity of his\ntribe by claiming the shrine for the new religion of Islam that he preached. He\nwanted the Kaaba to be dedicated to the worship of the one God alone, and all\nthe idols were evicted. The Black Stone (al-Hajar-ul-Aswad), still present at\nthe Kaaba ( SHIVA LINGAM ) was a special object of veneration at the site. :UNQUOTE\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE :&nbsp; The destruction of Hindu temples in India\nduring the Islamic conquest of India occurred from the beginning of Muslim\nconquest until the end the Mughal Empire throughout the Indian subcontinent. In\nhis book \"Hindu Temples - What Happened to Them\", Sita Ram Goel\nproduced a politically contentious list of 2000 mosques that it is claimed were\nbuilt on Hindu temples.[7]:&nbsp; UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE :&nbsp; In Indonesia, where popular conversion from\nHinduism to Islam was more widespread, it is believed that the minaret of the\nMenara Kudus Mosque, in Java, was originally part of a Hindu temple.[7] :UNQUOTE\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE : An inscription\nof 1462 A.D.at Jami Masjid at Malan, in Banaskantha District of Gujarat states:The\nJami Masjid was built by Khan-I-Azam Ulugh Khan, who suppressed the wretched\ninfidels. He eradicated the idolatrous houses and mine of infidelity, along\nwith the idols with the edge of the sword, and made ready this edifice. He made\nits walls and doors out of the idols; the back of every stone became the place\nfor prostration of the believer.[21]UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; Mughal Emperor Jahangir wrote in his\nTujuk-i-Jahangiri:&nbsp; \"I am here led\nto relate that at the city of Banaras a temple had been erected by Rajah Maun\nSing, which cost him the sum of nearly thirty-six laks of five methkaly\nashrefies. ...I made it my plea for throwing down the temple which was the\nscene of this imposture; and on the spot, with the very same materials, I\nerected the great mosque, because the very name of Islam was proscribed at\nBanaras, and with God\u2019s blessing it is my design, if I live, to fill it full\nwith true believers.\"[22]UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE :&nbsp; An inscription at the Quwwat Al-Islam Mosque\nadjacent to Qutb Minar in Delhi states:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"This Jamii Masjid\nbuilt in the months of the year 587 (hijri) by the Amir, the great, the\nglorious commander of the Army, Qutb-ud-daula wad-din, the amir-ul-umara Aibeg,\nthe slave of the Sultan, may God strengthen his helpers! The materials of 27\nidol temples, on each of which 2,000,000 Deliwal coins had been spent were used\nin the (construction of) this mosque.\"[19]&nbsp;\nHowever, as the inscription depicts, the mosque was built from the\nmaterial remnants of Hindu temples which was destroyed by Muslims.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alberuni in his\nIndia[20] writes about the famous temple of Multan:&nbsp;&nbsp; A famous idol of theirs was that of Multan,\ndedicated to the sun. When Muhammad Ibn Alkasim Ibn Almunabbih, conquered\nMultan, he inquired how the town had become so very flourishing and so many\ntreasures had there been accumulated, and then he found out that this idol was\nthe cause, for there came pilgrims from all sides to visit it.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Therefore he\nthought to build a mosque at the same place where the temple once stood. When\nthen the Karmatians occupied Multan, Jalam Ibn Shaiban, the usurper, broke the\nidol into pieces and killed its priests. When afterwards the blessed Prince\nMahmud swept away their rule from those countries, he made again the old mosque\nthe place of the Friday-worship. UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/secret-excavations-at-jerusalem-by.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/secret-excavations-at-jerusalem-by.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-l5hcXvw4I2w/VOJYR_wc59I/AAAAAAAA1Y0/z48BRHr0NSI/s1600/imr4ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"582\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-l5hcXvw4I2w/VOJYR_wc59I/AAAAAAAA1Y0/z48BRHr0NSI/s1600/imr4ages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have seen SWASTIKA\nsymbol in many ancient Greek and Roman sites. WERE RAPED.</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\nTHEY MADE THEM OUT TO BE GREEDY AND PUSILLANIMOUS -- THAT THEY SEWED THE ROYAL DIAMONDS INTO THEIR UNDERCLOTHES AND THE BULLETS COULD NOT KILL THEM-- SO THEIR CLOTHES HAD TO BE REMOVED ( ONLY THE YOUNG GIRLS ) AND SHOT AGAIN.</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: The remains of 17 year old Anastasia and her brother were found in another place.</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\nall records state that the camisoles ( undergarments ) of the daughters were missing --and it was because they did not die with bullets as the sewn in hard diamonds protected them like bulletproof jackets</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But hey, R has left a\nloophole for his stooge led nations to wriggle put. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The International Court\ndoes not enjoy a full separation of powers, with permanent members of the\nSecurity Council being able to veto enforcement of cases, even to which they\nconsented to be bound .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The loop hole is -- the\njurisdiction does not have binding force itself, in many cases the instances of\naggression are adjudicated by Security Council by adopting a resolution, etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nicaragua learnt it the\nhard way when USA used the VETO route.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CASE:&nbsp; Nicaragua v. United States.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Republic of\nNicaragua v. The United States of America (1986) ICJ 1 is a public\ninternational law case decided by the International Court of Justice (ICJ).&nbsp; The ICJ ruled in favor of Nicaragua and\nagainst the United States and awarded reparations to Nicaragua.&nbsp; The ICJ held that the U.S. had violated\ninternational law by supporting the Contras in their rebellion against the\nNicaraguan government and by mining Nicaragua's harbors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The United States\nrefused to participate in the proceedings after the Court rejected its argument\nthat the ICJ lacked jurisdiction to hear the case.&nbsp; The U.S. later blocked enforcement of the\njudgment by the United Nations Security Council and thereby prevented Nicaragua\nfrom obtaining any actual compensation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Nicaraguan\ngovernment finally withdrew the complaint from the court in September 1992\n(under the later, post-FSLN, government of Violeta Chamorro), following a\nrepeal of the law requiring the country to seek compensation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">United States had\nACTUALLY breached international law by--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. violating the\nsovereignty of Nicaragua by:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">armed attacks against\nNicaragua by air, land and sea;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">incursions into\nNicaraguan territorial waters;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">aerial trespass into\nNicaraguan airspace;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">efforts by direct and\nindirect means to coerce and intimidate the Government of Nicaragua.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. using force and the\nthreat of force against Nicaragua.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. intervening in the\ninternal affairs of Nicaragua.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/69rQ4x5AHnU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"http://www.youtube.com/embed/69rQ4x5AHnU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div style=\"zoom: 1;\" unselectable=\"on\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 22.3999996185303px;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"zoom: 1;\" unselectable=\"on\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"zoom: 1;\" unselectable=\"on\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 25 July 1998,\nYeltsin appointed Vladimir Putin head of the FSB (one of the successor agencies\nto the KGB), the position Putin occupied until August 1999. Yeltsin also\nannounced that he wanted to see Putin as his successor. Still later on that\nsame day, Putin agreed to run for the presidency<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 12 September 2007,\nPutin dissolved the government upon the request of Prime Minister Mikhail\nFradkov. Fradkov commented that it was to give the President a \"free\nhand\" in the run-up to the parliamentary election. Viktor Zubkov was\nappointed the new prime minister<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Putin was barred from a\nthird term by the Constitution. First Deputy Prime Minister Dmitry Medvedev was\nelected his successor. On 8 May 2008, only a day after handing the presidency\nto Medvedev, Putin was appointed Prime Minister of Russia, maintaining his\npolitical dominance. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the United Russia\nCongress in Moscow on 24 September 2011, Medvedev officially proposed that\nPutin stand for the Presidency in 2012, an offer which Putin accepted.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 22.3999996185303px;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></span><span kind=\"d\">\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Putin announced that he\nwould seek a third, non-consecutive term as President in the 2012 presidential\nelection, an announcement which led to large-scale protests in many Russian\ncities managed by Trojan Horse NGOs funded by R.&nbsp; Putin won the election in March 2012 and is now\nserving a six-year term<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE Kolomyski has\nused Privat's \"quasi-military forces\" to enforce hostile takeovers of\ncompanies, sending a team of \"hired rowdies armed with baseball bats, iron\nbars, gas and rubber bullet pistols and chainsaws\" to forcibly take over a\nKremenchuk steel plant in 2006,[24] and has used \"a mix of phony court\norders (often involving corrupt judges and/or registrars) and strong-arm\ntactics\" to replace directors on the boards of companies he purchases\nstakes in.[25] Kolomyski was criticized by Mr Justice Mann in a court case in\nLondon involving an attempted hostile takeover of an oil company, with the\njudge stating that Kolomyski had \"a reputation of having sought to take control\nof a company at gunpoint in Ukraine\" and that there were \"strong\ngrounds for doubting the honesty of Mr Kolomoisk .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 2 March 2014, amidst\nthe 2014 pro-Russian conflict in Ukraine, acting President Oleksandr Turchynov\nappointed Kolomoyskyi governor of Dnipropetrovsk Oblast.[30] Two days later,\nRussian President Vladimir Putin described Kolomoyskyi as a \"unique\ncrook,\" and said that the citizens of Dnipropetrovsk were not happy with\nhis appointment as Governor of Dnipropetrovsk Oblast.[9] In contrast, The Daily\nBeast, a US publication, wrote in mid-June 2014 that Kolomoyskyi enjoyed the\nlocal population's strong support.[31]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In April 2014\nKolomoyskyi offered a bounty for the capture of Russian-backed militants and\nincentives for the turning in of weapons.[32] He also is believed to have spent\n$10 million to create the Dnipro Battalion,[31][33] and also funds the Aidar,\nAzov, Dnepr 1, Dnepr 2, and Donbas volunteer battalions.[34] Members of the\nAidar Battalion \u201chave been involved in widespread abuses, including abductions,\nunlawful detention, ill-treatment, theft, extortion, and possible executions,\u201d\naccording to Amnesty International, while the Azov Battalion was seen flying\nflags carrying symbols of a Ukraine neo-Nazi party, Patriot of Ukraine.[35]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; Then some Russian Jews became jittery about lions . TEE HEEE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The offer was first\nmade by British Colonial Secretary Joseph Chamberlain to Theodore Herzl's\nZionist group in 1903. He offered 13,000 sq km ) of the Mau Plateau in what is\ntoday Kenya. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The idea was brought to\nthe World Zionist Organization's Zionist Congress at its sixth meeting in 1903 in\nBasel. Before the vote on the matter, the Russian delegation stormed out in\nopposition. In the end, the motion to consider the plan passed by 295 to 177\nvotes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On March 28, 1928, the\nPresidium of the General Executive Committee of the USSR passed the decree\n\"On the attaching for Komzet of free territory near the Amur River in the\nFar East for settlement of the working Jews.\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then in 1930 they tried\nto carve out a homeland in Ukraine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ukrainians and Crimeans\nwere reluctant to have a Jewish national home carved out of their territory,\neven though most Soviet Jews lived there, By the 1930s, a massive propaganda\ncampaign was underway to induce more Jewish settlers to move there. Some\nmethods used the standard Soviet propaganda tools of the era, and included\nposters and Yiddish-language novels describing a socialist utopia there. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Quietely Jews started\narriving in Ukraine. As the Jewish population grew, so did the impact of\nYiddish culture on the region.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">World War II brought to\nan abrupt end concerted efforts to bring Jews east. In the Ukrainian People's\nRepublic, Yiddish was a state language along with Ukrainian and Russian. &nbsp;They created the Jewish National Union and the\ncommunity was granted an autonomous status.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By R\u2019s efforts Yiddish was\nused on Ukrainian currency in 1917-1920. Before World War II, a little under\none-third of Ukraine's urban population consisted of Jews who were the largest\nnational minority in Ukraine. Ukrainian Jews are comprised by a number of\nethnic groups, including Ashkenazi Jews, Mountain Jews, Bukharan Jews, Karaite\nJews, Krymchak Jews and Georgian Jews.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;
