<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The quintessential&nbsp; \u2018Jewish nose\u2019 is not a genetic trait of\nIsrael, but the Caucasus.&nbsp; The Khazars ,\nthe ancestors of Rothschild , spoke a Turkic language.&nbsp; Khazars to be descendants of the Turkic\ntribe, known as the Huns or Hun, that invaded and savaged Europe from Asia\naround AD 450. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They made their living\nas traders and \u2018middlemen\u2019, levying exhorbitant taxes on the spice goods which\noriginated from Kerala , my home state , carried on the trade routes through\ntheir lands. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their influence in\nEastern Europe extended well into the countries we now know as Poland,\nCzechoslovakia, Austria, Hungary, Romania and Bulgaria . The Khazars were once\nworhippers of the Shiva Lingam, before they became Jews.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>The Khazars were once\nworhippers of the Shiva Lingam, before they became Jews.&nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-peNmImiBc3A/VNIm5_yEZCI/AAAAAAAA0-Q/YM9MSdApH3A/s1600/75c125c9-9bbfdcf-457a-af47-de1078ac54e3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-peNmImiBc3A/VNIm5_yEZCI/AAAAAAAA0-Q/YM9MSdApH3A/s1600/75c125c9-9bbfdcf-457a-af47-de1078ac54e3.jpg\" height=\"596\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In about AD 740, the\nKing of Khazaria, King Bulan, adopted the religion of Judaism and the whole\nnation did the same. Their home was not the Dead Sea, but the Caspian Sea,\nwhich became known as the `Khazar Sea\u2019. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Khazars were\ninstrumental in the creation of the Magyar homeland of Hungary. &nbsp;&nbsp;Names like the Russian Cossack and the\nHungarian Hussar came from \u2018Khazar\u2019, as did the German for heretic, Ketzer. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An ancient traditional\npre-Christian account of Hungarian origins says they are the descendants of the\nBabylonian Nimrod.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The legend claims that\nNimrod had two sons, Magor and Hunor. &nbsp;&nbsp;It\nis said that Magor was the ancestor of the Magyars and Hunor was the ancestor\nof the Huns, so providing the common origin of the Magyars and the Huns\n(Khazars).&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Over the centuries of\nwaning power and influence, the Khazar peoples began to emigrate in many\ndirections. &nbsp;&nbsp;The Khazar \u2018Jews\u2019 were\nconfined to ghettos as a result of papal dictat in the mid-16th century. .. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of these\nimmigrants went by the name of Bauer, now known as the Rothschilds. &nbsp;&nbsp;The family quickly took control of the\nfinancial and trade foundations of Europe.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They are Sephardic Jews\nand they do have an historical connection to the Middle East, although, even\nthen, the idea of a \u2018chosen race\u2019 going back to biblical Israel still doesn\u2019t\nstand up. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Ashkenazim\n(\u2018Khazars\u2019) hold the reins of power in Israel and have done so since the\ncountry was created in 1948.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the centuries after\nthe demise of Khazaria, the Ashkenazi did not speak the Semitic language of\nHebrew, which is no surprise at all because they were not Hebrews. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>There are deadly bee\nkilling insecticide ( neonicotinoids&nbsp; ) Imidacloprid\nand Clothianidin which must be studied immediately..<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>They &nbsp;seep into pollen and nectar, damaging\nbeneficial insects such as bees.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Neonicotinoid\npesticides kill honeybees by damaging their immune system, making them unable\nto fight diseases and bacteria.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>A third of everything\nwe eat is pollinated by bees and other beneficial insects. Studies of his movement, Connors wrote, reveal\n\"that the Russian President carries a neurological abnormality.\". </span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xE7H24UhoCU/VNMuMXp259I/AAAAAAAA1BQ/J3nIcNbDgMQ/s1600/asperger_s38hghgymptoms.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xE7H24UhoCU/VNMuMXp259I/AAAAAAAA1BQ/J3nIcNbDgMQ/s1600/asperger_s38hghgymptoms.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"332\" /></a></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Above: Sorry - it will NOT work-- hero Putin has NONE of these symptoms.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 2008 study was one\nof many by Connors and her colleagues, who are contractors for the Office of\nNet Assessment (ONA), an internal Pentagon think tank that helps devise\nlong-term military strategy. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the eve of war with\nthe Soviet Union, he flew solo to Scotland , with a message for peace from\nHitler himself.&nbsp; Hess was arrested and\nbecame a POW.&nbsp; On 10 May 1941, at about 6:00pm,\nHess took off from Augsburg in a Messerschmitt Bf 110 (radio code VJ+OQ) which\nhe had equipped with drop tanks to increase its range.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hess crash landed at\nFloors Farm near Eaglesham at 23.09pm and gave his name as \"Alfred\nHorn\", a friend of the Duke of Hamilton; he asked to be taken to the Duke.\nHess, however, was taken to hospital for injuries sustained during his descent.\nHamilton was informed of the prisoner and visited him whereupon he revealed his\ntrue identity. Hamilton immediately contacted Winston Churchill, and informed\nhim of the Deputy F\u00fchrer's arrival.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The wreckage of the\naircraft was salvaged by 63 Maintenance Unit between 11 and 16 May 1941. The\naeroplane was found to be armed with machine guns in the nose but there was no\nammunition on board. .</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/--uuO1y8KSMo/VNMLM9_1XgI/AAAAAAAA0_8/l0_Tss-s0LQ/s1600/hess_292642312b.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/--uuO1y8KSMo/VNMLM9_1XgI/AAAAAAAA0_8/l0_Tss-s0LQ/s1600/hess_292642312b.jpg\" height=\"399\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n.<o:p></o:p><br />\n\n\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hess was quoted by his\nwife Ilse as saying:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"My coming to\nEngland in this way is, as I realise, so unusual that nobody will easily\nunderstand it. I was confronted by a very hard decision. I do not think I could\nhave arrived at my final choice unless I had continually kept before my eyes\nthe vision of an endless line of children's coffins with weeping mothers behind\nthem, both English and German, and another line of coffins of mothers with\nmourning children\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; R ussia engaged in active\ncultural, commercial, and political contacts with European states. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Peter made Russia a modern nation.</span></li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_426B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; line-height: 22.3999996185303px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px; text-align: left;\">\n\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He built the\nfoundations of Russia\u2019s &nbsp;armed forces ,\nthat it is the strongest on this planet today.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He captured a warm\nwater port so that Russia could export her goods\u2014yes- St Petersberg . He needed\na better seaport than Arkhangelsk, which was on the White Sea to the north and\nclosed to shipping for months during the winter. On September 1, 1914, after\nthe outbreak of World War I, the Imperial government renamed the city\nPetrograd, meaning \"Peter's City\", to remove the German words Sankt\nand Burg.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1918, after killing\nthe czar and his lovely family , the Bolshevik Jews shifted the &nbsp;central government bodies moved from Saint\nPetersburg to Moscow. On January 26, 1924, five days after Lenin's death,\nPetrograd was renamed Leningrad by the murdering Jews.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During World War II,\nGerman forces besieged Leningrad following the Axis invasion of the Soviet\nUnion in June 1941. The siege lasted 872 days, from September 1941 to January\n1944. The Siege of Leningrad proved one of the longest, most destructive, and\nmost lethal sieges of a major city in modern history.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_426B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-PpggZbW9IWE/VNN-kUutOqI/AAAAAAAA1B0/A1wpWKKshko/s1600/Peter_der-Grosse_1t5ht838.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-PpggZbW9IWE/VNN-kUutOqI/AAAAAAAA1B0/A1wpWKKshko/s1600/Peter_der-Grosse_1t5ht838.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"476\" /></a></div>\n.<o:p></o:p><br />\n\n\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though his life was\nrelatively short, the works of his mind, ambition and will have affected the\ncountry of Russia to its present course. Peter the Great pushed his\nconstituents through new laws, reforms and his attempts to bring modernity to\nhis country. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Peter Alekseevich\nRomanov was born in June 1672 and died at the age of 53 in his beloved town of\nSt Petersburg. Though his life was relatively short, the works of his mind,\nambition and will have affected the country of Russia to its present course. &nbsp;Peter the Great pushed his constituents\nthrough new laws, reforms and his attempts to bring modernity to his country. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Peter focused on the\ndevelopment of science and recruited several experts to educate his people\nabout technological advancements. He concentrated on developing commerce and\nindustry. he modernized the Russian alphabet, introduced the Julian calendar,\nand established the first Russian newspaper. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Peter acquired\nterritory in Estonia, Latvia and Finland; and through several wars with Turkey\nin the south, he secured access to the Black Sea. In 1709, he defeated the Swedish\narmy by purposely directing their troops to the city of Poltva, in the midst of\nan unbearable Russian winter. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1712, Peter\nestablished the city of St. Petersburg on the Neva River and moved the capital\nthere from its former location in Moscow. Shortly after, St. Petersburg was\ndeemed Russia's \"window to Europe.\" Under Peter's rule, Russia became\na great European nation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1721, he proclaimed\nRussia an empire and was accorded the title of Emperor of All Russia, Great\nFather of the Fatherland, and \"the Great.\" Although he proved to be\nan effective leader, Peter the Great died on February 8, 1725, without\nnominating an heir. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS A MISTAKE PUTIN\nMUST NOT REPEAT.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Peter is entombed in\nthe Cathedral of Saints Peter and Paul, located in in St. Petersburg.&nbsp; I have been there.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Peter the Great\u2019s sheer\nphysical presence seemed to indicate the way his rule would go. He was nearly 7\nfeet tall , powerful and very broad. &nbsp; He was fifty-two years, seven months old when he\ndied, having reigned forty-two years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_426B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Old man loses his\ntemper lifting up his luxurious moustache and revealing his mouth \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YEH KYA HAI \u2013 YEH TERI\nMAA KI PUDDHI HAI KYA ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I never got fed up with\nhis WW1 model hilarious grandfather stories.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So then he told me\nanother story\u2014when his grandfather was young he came back for a flying visit in\nthe middle of war , because his mother died . &nbsp;He did some religious ceremonies and then he\nwent back within&nbsp; week , to fight WW1 in\nforeign land of Europe within&nbsp; week .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He left behind a heavy\ncanvas kit bag and his small daughter took out a huge and heavy contraption \u2013which\nhas a huge drinking cup type thing at one end. The whole day all in the house\nwere trying to figure out what it is. &nbsp;It\nwas shaped like the coal fired iron they sued to press their clothes. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So finally one neighbor\nsardaarji &nbsp;told with great confidence\u2014Oh yes,\nI know \u2013that hollow thing is a coal holder . You must put coal into it and set\nit on fire and then the iron will become hot and you can iron your clothes. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qQ9A1d5UDII/VNP_IMGyeII/AAAAAAAA1CE/iOQBkQQUYo4/s1600/free_913780211.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qQ9A1d5UDII/VNP_IMGyeII/AAAAAAAA1CE/iOQBkQQUYo4/s1600/free_913780211.jpg\" height=\"452\" width=\"640\" /></a></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So the remaining part\nof the day some 6 people were trying to do this. It was days later that someone\nfound that there was an electrical cord with a plug too in the bag , nicely\ncoiled and kept in a paper bag. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their village had NO\nelectricity and this ELECTRIC IRON was of NO use. They were all mortally afraid\nwhat would happen when he came back on leave again. But the poor guy was\nwounded in Europe and he had forgotten about the iron.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At that time I had told\nhim to write to his mother and ask her father , how many Indians fought with\nhim those days . </span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QmafLfL4sEY/VNQAgGsr4qI/AAAAAAAA1Cc/7tIeoDpkIsY/s1600/09wFYT867ar1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QmafLfL4sEY/VNQAgGsr4qI/AAAAAAAA1Cc/7tIeoDpkIsY/s1600/09wFYT867ar1.jpg\" height=\"452\" width=\"640\" /></a></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The answer was \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONLY INDIANS FOUGHT \u2013\nTHE COWARDLY WHITE SOLDIER WAS DIGGING TRENCHES IN SAFE PLACES. THE COWARDLY\nARMY OFFICERS WOULD ONLY GIVE ORDERS FROM SAFE PLACES - USING WHITE MESSENGER LOWER\nRANK OFFICERS .</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-nuS92VvYgJI/VNQAFQW9yZI/AAAAAAAA1CU/qdqeaFrvn6U/s1600/300px-Sikh_sol557diers_in_Paris_WW1_in_1916.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-nuS92VvYgJI/VNQAFQW9yZI/AAAAAAAA1CU/qdqeaFrvn6U/s1600/300px-Sikh_sol557diers_in_Paris_WW1_in_1916.jpg\" height=\"411\" width=\"640\" /></a></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now I remember the\nRussian girls in thousands at Odessa beach never removed their hair- and their arm\npits and &nbsp;either side of the crotch panties\nused to sport luxurious hair which was indeed very titillating . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We were a cadet ship\nwith 18 officer cadets all aged ( 18 to 19 ).. There were some girls without\nhair too- but we were told that the ones with massive hair were the ones from\nSiberia- who had been given a summer vacation. I guess they never heard of hair\nremover or razor.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We were in a huge hotel\nby the sea side . &nbsp;We carried onions and\nour seniors pissed on the top onion bag layer causing them to rot. So as soon\nas the Russians ( agriculture dept ) in Odessa saw the rotten onions lying\nright on top, when the hatches were opened they demanded FUMIGATION-and then we\nhad to stay in a hotel for 3 days \u2013 &nbsp;the entire\ncrew on company expense.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2018<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We used toplay cricket\non the beack and we had a good audience of ogling Russian beauties.&nbsp; It was impossible to walk with touching a TIT\nor an ASS \u2013such was the crowd on the beach&nbsp;\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My sikh friend was the cynosure\nof all eyes at the beach as he used to leave his waist length hair loose at the\nbeach.&nbsp; And there was this SHEVCHENKO\nPARK ( we called it SHIVASHANKARAN PARK ) where there was a huge outdoor\ndancing bay\u2014where at any time more than 500 young girls would be there looking\nfor partners.</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JxWS_jRYumg/VNP_s2XkiHI/AAAAAAAA1CM/tJ7CYUuq84g/s1600/picturepi49Gcture10544_33457.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JxWS_jRYumg/VNP_s2XkiHI/AAAAAAAA1CM/tJ7CYUuq84g/s1600/picturepi49Gcture10544_33457.jpg\" height=\"422\" width=\"640\" /></a></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We got plenty of them\nas they all wanted WRIGGLEYs CHEWING GUM and KENT CIGARETTES \u2013which we had in\nplenty in our bulging pockets . The guards used to detain all other\nnationalities at the port gates ( one minute after midnight cut off time ) but\nthey would allow ONLY INDIANS through even at 3 AM.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today this place is\ncalled a separate nation Ukraine \u2013such an unhappy place.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_426B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; line-height: 22.3999996185303px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px; text-align: left;\"><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The gullible Sikh\nsoldiers were told that their holy book with protect them and these na\u00efve soldiers\nwere eager to spill their blood in the most dangerous areas.&nbsp; </span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FbeQEvfU7Hw/VNQDYc2s_1I/AAAAAAAA1Co/FJCv9-PwTFU/s1600/sikh-soldG864ier-carrying-sggs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FbeQEvfU7Hw/VNQDYc2s_1I/AAAAAAAA1Co/FJCv9-PwTFU/s1600/sikh-soldG864ier-carrying-sggs.jpg\" /></a></div>\n&nbsp;.<o:p></o:p><br />\n\n\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every time they white\nofficers passed by the book they were under strict instructions from R to bow\nwith great reverence to the holy book and salute. &nbsp;Non compliance meant immediate court martial \u2013\nNO mercy was shown to the white officer however senior or decorated he was.. &nbsp;Gen Patton was assassinated just because he slapped a COWARD Jew soldier .</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1ln6-OC3t2c/VNQJagTqIdI/AAAAAAAA1DA/1Pjd0xB26O4/s1600/india30p0001.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/assassination-of-general-george-patton.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/assassination-of-general-george-patton.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white man knew that\nthis book was written by a white man and they used to laugh later in their officers\nquarters, &nbsp;how they bowed and salutes ,\nimitating and trying to outdo each other. . how the Sikhs were trying to drive\naway the flies from the book etc . &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All this was told to me\nby a very old British soldier in UK in the seventies \u2013 in a bar . He said he\nhad been to Mumabi and Calcutta. When I asked him to name a place he said \u2013\nKamatipura and Sonagachi and gave me a wink . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is how I wrote my\npost on Devadasis who gave FREE SEX to the white soldiers in COMFORT STATIONS .\n&nbsp;He praised the courage of Indian\nsoldiers he fought with&nbsp; shoulder to\nshoulder during WW1 , as a young man.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>They plan to do the\nsame to Pakistan\u2019s nuclear sites and put the blame on India. They will also of course\nbomb India too&nbsp; - this is the way FALSE\nFLAG ATTACKS work- so that Indians attack Pakistan in full force and Pakistan\nresponds with whatever nukes they have.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Richard V Allen\nnarrates :-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE - I was then\nPresident Ronald Reagan\u2019s national security adviser, after having been his\nchief foreign policy adviser for several years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That Sunday afternoon,\nI was on my back porch in Arlington, Va., wading through a small mountain of\nstaff memorandums, reports, diplomatic cables and the rest of my perpetually\nmounting paperwork. My progress was interrupted by a call on the \u201cdrop line\u201d\ndirect link from the communications center next to the White House Situation\nRoom; the duty officer was requesting that I go to the special secure line,\nkept in a safe in my basement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After a few fumbles\nwith the rotary dial, I opened the safe, inserted the current secure chip and\nconnected to the comm center. On the scratchy connection, the duty officer\nreported that Israeli warplanes were returning from their mission in Iraq, and\nwere by then over Saudi airspace. Oddly, the aircraft, F-16\u2019s and F-15\u2019s, were\nthought to be unable to make a round trip to Iraq: Israel couldn\u2019t refuel its\nplanes in the air and landing between the two countries was considered\nunthinkable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Equipped with this\nfragmentary information, I requested constant updates, then hastily connected\nto the White House switchboard and asked to be put through to President Reagan.\nWithin seconds, an officer at Camp David answered; I directed him to get the\npresident on the line immediately. He hesitated, then said, \u201cSorry, sir, he is\njust boarding the chopper here.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I ordered the officer\nto get the president off the helicopter and to the phone without delay, but he\ndemurred, indicating that the president might not like to be recalled. I\nsuggested that if he wasn\u2019t immediately brought to the phone, there would be\nconsequences. I could hear the whirring of the helicopter blades in the\nbackground.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In what seemed an\neternity but was only two minutes or so, President Reagan was on the line, a\nslight note of irritation in his voice: \u201cYes, Dick, what is it?\u201d I quickly\nrecited what happened, and he asked me to repeat the message. After pausing for\na few seconds, he asked, \u201cWhy do you suppose they did that?\u201d My answer was\nsomething to the effect that the Israelis clearly did not want that reactor to\nbecome operational.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He went silent, and the\nphone line again filled with the churning of the copter. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With characteristic\naplomb, he suddenly asked: \u201cWell, you know what?\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I said, \u201cWhat, Mr.\nPresident?\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">R stooge Ronald Reagan\u2019s\nretort was classic: </span><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">\u201cBOYS WILL BE BOYS !\u201c</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">( REST OF THE WORLD ARE\nTATTUs , RIGHT ? &nbsp;ONLY JEWS ARE MEN ? )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.nytimes.com/2010/06/07/opinion/07allen.html?_r=0\">http://www.nytimes.com/2010/06/07/opinion/07allen.html?_r=0</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_426B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; line-height: 22.3999996185303px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px; text-align: left;\"><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n&nbsp;. &nbsp;.<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8sUTFN5Xgkc/VNk_b3flSTI/AAAAAAAA1I4/-g-M4e6Dkq0/s1600/boyas-will-b7ke-boys.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8sUTFN5Xgkc/VNk_b3flSTI/AAAAAAAA1I4/-g-M4e6Dkq0/s1600/boyas-will-b7ke-boys.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"480\" /></a></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ishan<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">February 10, 2015 at\n12:57 AM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. But they cannot travel too far.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Butterflies can travel\nlonger distances, ensuring coverage of equal amounts of flowering plants in a\nlarger area. But that's not all: There are also moths and birds, to name a few\nother pollinators. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although they all are\nonly looking for food \u2014 nectar\u2014 they actually help plants reproduce. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Butterflies pollinate\nduring the day while flowers are open and they have a better color perception\nthan bees or even humans. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They can see red, their\nfavorite color, while bees cannot. They also find their nectar by being able to\nsee ultraviolet light which makes flower markings very distinct to them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than 90 percent of\nall plants need a pollinator to distribute pollen to set fruit and seeds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Hollywood movie\nINTERSTELLAR they show that GM crops have decimated all birds, bees and\nbutterflies and planet earth has become a dust bowl- with only GM corn left for\nfood, which was also creating disease and allergy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GMO food, drenched in\nneonics- kills the pollinaters . font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Russia's annexation of\nthe Crimea was fuelled by concerns that it would lose access to its Black Sea\nFleet naval base at Sevastopol if Ukraine continued to move towards NATO and\nEuropean integration. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Putin wants that &nbsp;NATO policy should shift towards recognizing\nUkraine as a buffer state between NATO and Russia, rather than attempting to\nabsorb Ukraine into NATO/ EU.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BAIT AND BLEED is a foul\nZionist strategy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The aim is to induce\nrival states to engage in a protracted war of attrition against each other\n\"so that they bleed each other white\", while the baiter who\nencouraged the conflict remains on the sidelines, maintaining its military\nstrength.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">BAIT AND BLEED</span></b> &nbsp;and <span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>BLOODLETTING</b></span> will be a Zionist policy when it comes to INDIA, PAKISTAN and CHINA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BLOODLETTING is a &nbsp;strategy which does not involve incitement or\nbaiting by a third party. When a state's rivals have gone to war independently,\nthe aim is to encourage the conflict to continue as long as possible, in order\nto let the rival states weaken or \"bleed\" each other's military\nstrength, while the bloodletting party stays out of the fighting.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This strategy is\nexemplified in then-U. S. Senator Harry Truman's statement in 1941 regarding\nthe Nazi invasion of Russia, \"If we see that Germany is winning we ought\nto help Russia, and if Russia is winning we ought to help Germany, and that way\nlet them kill as many as possible.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another example of this\nstrategy was Russia's withdrawal from World War I while the fighting in Europe\nbetween Germany and the remaining Allies continued. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his report to the\nThird Congress of Soviets in 1918, Jew Vladimir Lenin argued that by\nwithdrawing from the conflict \"we rid ourselves...of both imperialistic\ngroups fighting each other. We can take advantage of their strife...and use\nthat period when our hands are free to develop and strengthen the Jewish Socialist\nRevolution.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_426B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; line-height: 22.3999996185303px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px; text-align: left;\"><div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_426B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; line-height: 22.3999996185303px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px; text-align: left;\"><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Russia's annexation of\nthe Crimea was fuelled by concerns that it would lose access to its Black Sea\nFleet naval base at Sevastopol if Ukraine continued to move towards NATO and\nEuropean integration. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Putin wants that &nbsp;NATO policy should shift towards recognizing\nUkraine as a buffer state between NATO and Russia, rather than attempting to\nabsorb Ukraine into NATO/ EU.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BAIT AND BLEED is a foul\nZionist strategy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The aim is to induce\nrival states to engage in a protracted war of attrition against each other\n\"so that they bleed each other white\", while the baiter who\nencouraged the conflict remains on the sidelines, maintaining its military\nstrength.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BAIT AND BLEED &nbsp;and BLOODLETTING WILL BE A ZIONIST POLICY WHEN\nIT COMES TO INDIA, PAKISTAN and CHINA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BLOODLETTING is a &nbsp;strategy which does not involve incitement or\nbaiting by a third party. When a state's rivals have gone to war independently,\nthe aim is to encourage the conflict to continue as long as possible, in order\nto let the rival states weaken or \"bleed\" each other's military\nstrength, while the bloodletting party stays out of the fighting.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This strategy is\nexemplified in then-U. S. Senator Harry Truman's statement in 1941 regarding\nthe Nazi invasion of Russia, \"If we see that Germany is winning we ought\nto help Russia, and if Russia is winning we ought to help Germany, and that way\nlet them kill as many as possible.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another example of this\nstrategy was Russia's withdrawal from World War I while the fighting in Europe\nbetween Germany and the remaining Allies continued. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his report to the\nThird Congress of Soviets in 1918, Jew Vladimir Lenin argued that by\nwithdrawing from the conflict \"we rid ourselves...of both imperialistic\ngroups fighting each other. We can take advantage of their strife...and use\nthat period when our hands are free to develop and strengthen the Jewish Socialist\nRevolution.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ISIS armed and\nfunded&nbsp; by Zionists is a classing example\nof BLOODLETTING where SHIA and SUNNIS kill each other and cause a DNA program divide\nwhich will last till eternity .&nbsp; 'Why should the Arabs make\npeace? If I was an Arab leader I would never make terms with Israel. That is\nnatural: we have taken their country. Sure, God promised it to us, but what\ndoes that matter to them? Our God is not theirs. We come from Israel, it's\ntrue, but two thousand years ago, and what is that to them? There has been\nantisemitism, the Nazis, Hitler, Auschwitz, but was that their fault? They only\nsee one thing: we have come here and stolen their country. Why should they\naccept that? They may perhaps forget in one or two generations' time, but for the\nmoment there is no chance. So it's simple: we have to stay strong and maintain\na powerful army. Our whole policy is there. Otherwise the Arabs will wipe us\nout.'\"\u2014David Ben-Gurion, quoted in: N. Goldmann, The Jewish Paradox,\nGrosset &amp; Dunlap, New York, (1978), p. 99.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">President Ahmadinejad\nstated-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Today, they have\ncreated a myth in the name of Holocaust and consider it to be above God,\nreligion and the prophets, [***] If you committed this big crime, then why\nshould the oppressed Palestinian nation pay the price? This is our proposal: If\nyou committed the crime, then give a part of your own land in Europe, the\nUnited States, Canada or Alaska to them so that the Jews can establish their\ncountry.\"\u2014S. Delacourt, \"Iranian President Denies Holocaust, Sparks\nOutrage\", The Toronto Star, (15 December 2005), p. A1.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Zionists have always\nmade the truth a taboo subject. &nbsp;AIPAC\nand ADL &nbsp;often accuses those who speak\nthe truth of \"anti-Semitism\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Angela Merkel is NOT\nvery bright- like Hillary Clinton.&nbsp; She\nrose to power and continued on the chair , only due to R\u2019s largesse. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Russians who ship\nbase is in the far east go to Japan. In Japan they buy second hand Japanese\ncars \u2013 all in good condition. They place these cars on board ( not allowed ) .\nEvery nook and corner is occupied including the bridge wings and monkey island\ncompass deck-since even the Captain is doing it..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As soon as the ship\ncomes to Vladivostok, they ship\u2019s Russian crew lines up the cars on the quay.\nCustoms is bribed . &nbsp;Car buyers/ brokers\nfor mafia / mafia themselves come and name the prices. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So the third engineer has\na lovely Mitsubishi 6 cylinder sports model ( like the one my elder son has ).\nHe wanted it for himself. &nbsp;So a mafia guy\nwith gold jewellery approached him and told him the price. The third engineer\nsaid NO . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mafia guy increased\nthe price drastically , as he badly wanted the car. &nbsp;Third engineer said NO\u2014I want this car for\nmyself.&nbsp; &nbsp;There are rentable car sheds with door and\nlock , in case you want to store your car and take it away after a couple of\nmonths. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mafia guy has a\nsteel rod with him . &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;He\nfirst whacked the third engineer so badly that he nearly had multiple\nfractures. &nbsp;Then he used to pointed end\nof the heavy steel rod, to poke large holes all over the car\u2019s body, with\nnearly 50 people watching and smashed up the windscreen <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nobody could do a thing\nas these people have guns . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another officer bought\na car for himself and kept it in a rented shed . When he came the next voyage\nhe checked out his car. The door and lock was intact . &nbsp;But the car inside was missing. &nbsp;Some mafia guy has seen the car, rented the\nshed next to it , removed the intervening wall and stolen the car.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_426B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; line-height: 22.3999996185303px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px; text-align: left;\"><div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Japanese tourists used\nto come to Vladivostok in droves and buy Russian TV . &nbsp;&nbsp;This\nmade the Russians very proud as Jap TV was any day better than Russian TV in\nquality . &nbsp;&nbsp;Later it so transpired that\nas soon as they bought the TV, the broke it and removed the thick polished\ngrainy wood outer shell . &nbsp;This wooden\nshell would fit the Jap Sony model .&nbsp; TEE\nHEEEE !&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">This reminds me, when I\nwas a kid I used to throw away them large Rosgollas and drink only the flavoured\nsugar syrup .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_426B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Putin repaid all of the Soviet Union's debts\nby 2005. &nbsp;After 18 years of trying,\nRussia joined the World Trade Organization on 22 August 2012. However, there\nwere few immediate economic benefits evident from that WTO membership. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Russia diversified its\nexport markets by building the Trans-Siberian oil pipeline to the markets of\nChina, Japan and Korea, as well as the Sakhalin\u2013Khabarovsk\u2013Vladivostok gas\npipeline in the Russian Far East. Putin sought to increase Russia's share of\nthe European energy market by building submerged gas pipelines bypassing\nUkraine and other countries which were often seen as non-reliable transit\npartners by Russia, especially following Russia-Ukraine gas disputes of the\nlate 2000s<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2012, Putin was\nhonored in Bethlehem and a street was named after him. &nbsp;Putin regularly attends the most important\nservices of the Russian Orthodox Church on the main Orthodox Christian holidays.\nPutin is NOT a SOULESS COMMIE SON OF A BITCH . &nbsp;&nbsp;Putin is popular amongst the Russian Jewish\ncommunity, who see him as a force for stability.&nbsp; . Russia's chief rabbi, Berel Lazar, said\nPutin \"paid great attention to the needs of our community and related to\nus with a deep respect.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Putin has also sought\nto increase Russian military presence in the Arctic. In August 2007, a Russian\nexpedition planted a flag on the seabed below the North Pole. &nbsp;Modi must know that Japan is a loggerheads\nwith Russia and China. &nbsp;&nbsp;Antediluvian\nxenophobia runs deep.&nbsp; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Relations between\nRussia and the United Kingdom deteriorated when the United Kingdom granted\npolitical asylum to Putin's former patron, oligarch Boris Berezovsky in 2003.\nBut all hell broke loose when Snowden sought asylum in Russia.&nbsp; &nbsp;This\ndeterioration was intensified by allegations that the Zionists in Britain were\nspying and making secret payments to pro-democracy and human rights NGOs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In April 2008, Putin\nbecame the first Russian President who visited Libya.[235] Putin condemned the\nforeign military intervention of Libya, he called UN resolution as\n\"defective and flawed,\" and added \"It allows everything. It\nresembles medieval calls for crusades.\" Upon the death of Muammar Gaddafi,\nPutin called it as \"planned murder\" by the US, saying: \"They\nshowed to the whole world how he (Gaddafi) was killed,\" and \"There\nwas blood all over. Is that what they call a democracy?\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In June 2012, in Paris,\nPutin rejected the statement of R stooge and French President Francois Hollande\nwho called on Bashar Al-Assad to step down. Putin opposed any foreign\nintervention. Putin echoed the argument of the Assad regime that anti-regime\n'\u2019militants'\u2019 were responsible for much of the bloodshed. &nbsp;&nbsp;Putin talked about previous NATO\ninterventions and their results, and asked \"What is happening in Libya, in\nIraq? Did they become safer? Where are they heading? font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A series of the\nso-called R sponsored color revolutions in the post-Soviet states, namely the\nRose Revolution in Georgia in 2003, the Orange Revolution in Ukraine in 2004\nand the Tulip Revolution in Kyrgyzstan in 2005, led to frictions in the\nrelations of those countries with Russia. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In December 2004, Putin\ncriticised the Rose and Orange Revolution, according to him: \"If you have\npermanent revolutions you risk plunging the post-Soviet space into endless\nconflict\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The International court\nof Justice , Hague held the Russian Federation liable for $50 billion, finding\nthat\u201d it bankrupted the country's largest oil producer to plunder the company's\nassets\u201d ( sic !). &nbsp;It is largest arbitral\naward ever made. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This courts &nbsp;main functions are to settle legal disputes\nsubmitted to it by states and to provide advisory opinions on legal questions\nsubmitted to it by duly authorized international branches, agencies, and the UN\nGeneral Assembly. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSTOP PRESS:<br /><br />JUST WATCHED THE 2009 MOVIE \" THE INTERNATIONAL\"<br /><br />EVEN THIS 6 YEARS OLD MOVIE TALKS ABOUT SELLING MISSILES TO COUNTRIES AND SELLING COUNTER MISSILE CHIPS TO OPPOSING NATIONS.<br /><br />WHY IS ISRAEL DARLING NARENDRA MODI BUYING BARAK MISSILES ?<br /><br />IS HE ON THE SIDE OF BHARATMATA OR ZIONISTS ?<br /><br />AK, ANTONY DID NOT BUY HARDWARE -- ATLEAST HE DID NOT SELL OUT INDIA TO ZIONISTS.<br /><br /><br />http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barak_Missile_scandal<br /><br />IF YOU BUT MISSILES FROM ZIONIST NATIONS, IT CANNOT BE USED AGAINST NATO AND THEIR ZIONIST FRIEND NATIONS -- THE ENTIRE MISSILE IT CAN BE COUNTERMANDED ( EVEN IN FLIGHT ) JUST BY A REMOTE BUTTON .<br /><br />drones can be made to return back and kill the launcher.<br /><br />U.S. Navy bought 59,000 microchips for use in everything from missiles to transponders that turned out to be rogues from China. -- these chips had been made with a \"back-door\" and could have been remotely shut down at any time.<br /><br />Israeli jets bombed a nuclear installation in northeastern Syria- the state of the art Syrian rada failed to warn the Syrian military of the incoming assault .<br /><br />The Syrian radar had a deliberate hidden \u201dbackdoor\u201d inside. By sending a preprogrammed code to those chips, the enemy had disrupted the chips' function and temporarily blocked the radar.<br /><br />Fighter jets can be dropped from the sky by a KILL CHIP.<br /><br />Submarines can be polled underwater and killed from the sky.<br /><br />Zionist military contractors ensure that arms provided to arab nations cannot be stolen and used by an enemy.<br /><br />A kill switch is any manipulation of the chip's software or hardware that would cause the chip to die outright--to shut off an F-35's missile-launching electronics, for example. A backdoor, by contrast, lets outsiders gain access to the system through code or hardware to disable or enable a specific function. Because this method works without shutting down the whole chip, users remain unaware of the intrusion. An enemy could use it to bypass battlefield radio encryption, for instance.<br /><br />A simple NICK on the copper wiring of a GOOD chip is enough. The fault is impossible to detect, would make the chip fail early, due to electromigration: as current flowed through the wire, eventually the metal atoms would migrate and form voids, and the wire would break. If this chip goes into a defense satellite, where it's supposed to work for 15 years but fails after six months, you have a very expensive, DUD satellite.<br /><br />I AM SURE ISRAEL AND BAAAAA DARLING MODI / PARRIKAR / ARMY-NAVY- AIRFORCE CHIEFS KNOWS THIS .<br /><br />WELL IF OUR ALICE IN GUJJULAND DOES NOT KNOW THIS -- AT LEAST PAKISTAN KNEW THIS A FULL DECADE AGO.<br /><br />At hearing, a U.S. House Committee on Foreign Affairs addressed Pakistan's ongoing refusal to let the United States help it secure its nuclear arsenal with American technology. Pakistan remains reluctant to allow such intervention, citing fears that the United States would use the opportunity to cripple its weapons with- -what else?--a SIMPLE kill chip.<br /><br />INDIA MUST MAKE OUR OWN CHIPS.<br /><br />I HOPE MODI KNOWS THE WIKI LEAKS CONTENTS AGAINST GEORGE FERNANDES.<br /><br />Parikkar must know that even a simple assault rifle can be remotely disabled. Iraqi security recruits were issues such arms by USA.<br /><br />http://www.businessinsider.com/navy-chinese-microchips-weapons-could-have-been-shut-off-2011-6?IR=T<br /><br />GOD SAVE BHARATMATA FROM THESE ISRAEL DARLINGS .<br /><br />KURSI MAANGTHA HAI NAA ?<br /><br />PUT THIS COMMENT IN MODIs, SWAMYs , RAJNATH SINGHs and PARRIKKARs WEBSITES.<br /><br /><br />MODI MUST BE THINKING HE LOST DELHI ELECTIONS BY THE KIRAN BEDI FACTOR ALONE --<br /><br />THINK AGAIN !!<br /><br />capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_426B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The word yoga finds its\nroots in Sanskrit, which means \u201cto yoke\u201d the body, mind and spirit &nbsp;together into one by intertwining breathing\npractices and exercises.. Sanskrit ( Malayalam ) root &nbsp;YOJ &nbsp;meaning \"to yoke or join together.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hatha yoga and Raja\nyoga are two forms of yoga.&nbsp; . Hatha yoga\ndeals with the well-being of the physical body and includes all the asanas for\nbody and mind benefits.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; . Pranayama\ncomes under Hatha yoga. &nbsp;&nbsp;Ha means \"sun\" and tha means\n\"moon.\" \u2013this addresses Ida and Pingala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Raja yoga deals with\nspirit and mind . It helps to get inner peace, meditation or dhyan, relief from\nstress which is the biggest problems in today\u2019s life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The different postures\nor asanas include:-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
