font-size: large;\"><b>Below: Remember , you were born with the stars - you are as old as the sun</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/--Y0eNvtXIYs/VMCW7FHkcfI/AAAAAAAA0xE/SIvG_bEOzoI/s1600/soGSHul-body.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/--Y0eNvtXIYs/VMCW7FHkcfI/AAAAAAAA0xE/SIvG_bEOzoI/s1600/soGSHul-body.jpg\" width=\"523\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Long-term diabetics suffer from nerve damage due to constant high sugar levels that the body struggles to balance out. The nerve damage leads to the slowing of nerve impulses, decreased sensation, and numbness of the feet. When you follow a regular yoga schedule, your body commences responding to insulin that helps immensely in the reduction of blood glucose and it is also an excellent way to fight stress.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Marma Vidya of Shukracharya is the science of awakening the 108 marmas for yoga and healing. It involves manipulating the flow of prana in the body via yoga asana and or pressure on marma points . It is the highest stage of training within Kalari, the indigenous martial art of Kerala. .older than the Parashurama system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/12/kalaripayattu-oldest-and-deadliest.html\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/12/kalaripayattu-oldest-and-deadliest.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The 108 marmas are also referred to as the&nbsp;&nbsp;points of prana, found within the subtle body.&nbsp;&nbsp;Marmas are also referred to as minor chakras.&nbsp;&nbsp;Though they are identical in structure to the seven great chakras, they are found throughout the body rather than on the sushumna nadi (psychic channel) of the spine.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">An advanced Kalari Master can disable or kill his opponent merely by touching the correct Marma point. However, this is taught only to the most promising and level-headed persons to discourage the misuse of the technique.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Marma points are grouped according to the region of the body, Arms-22 points; legs-22 points (11 per lib); abdomen-3 points, chest \u2013 9 points, back \u2013 points, head and neck- 37 points. The marma points are also grouped according to muscles \u2013 10 points; tenders/ligaments \u2013 23 points, Arteries \u2013 9 points, Veins, joints \u2013 20 points bones \u2013 8 points.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Traditionally marma points are grouped in to 3 categories: those on the legs and feet, (sanakha marma : on the trunk (Madhayamanga marma ): neck and head (jatrurdhara marma ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The heart, forehead and throat are the most vulnerable areas of the body, whereas the areas on the arms and legs are less vulnerable to severe injury.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;When imbalances exist in the body, the Marma points become sore, but through Marma Abhyanga therapy, balance can be restored.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Marma abhyanga not only relieves back pain, stiffness and sports injuries but also stimulates various bodily organs and systems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Prana is a form of vital energy. Prana pervades each and every corner of the body, and it nourishes, guides and controls the functioning of the cell and systems. When these marma (junctions) are affected or ruptured, the organs linked with prana channels become starved with lack of prana and some organ becomes diseased, crippled or paralysed or depending upon the quantum is of prana being lost, it may lead to slow or sudden death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">They are classified for better understanding according to the physical components:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Mansa marma - muscle</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Sira marma - vessels conveying body fluids and impulses<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Sanyu - tendons<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Asthi - bones<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Sandhi - articulate points specially bone joints<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The marma are also grouped on the basis of their similarities in the features particularly on the basis of vulnerability:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Sadhya Pranhara Marma:-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Sadhya means sudden or immediate. These marma are vulnerable for the loss of life immediately after injury or insult.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Kalantara Pranhara:-&nbsp;&nbsp;Kalantara means after the lapse of some time, Pranhara means loss of life. After infliction to these marma, loss of life results gradually after some time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Vishalyaghana:-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Vishalya means being the foreign body removed. This category of Marma is named on its surgical importance. Vishalyaghana indicated death being the foreign body removed. When injured the person survives as long the foreign body remains in place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Vaikalyakara:-&nbsp;&nbsp;Vilkala means deform or cripple. Along with their ability to kill, however, comes an ability to heal.&nbsp;&nbsp;Wounded kalari fighters were nursed back to health with marma therapy. Practitioners used marma-point massage to stimulate healing in areas that corresponded to the soldier's injuries.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">If a warrior suffered a blow to the small intestines, for example, the marma point on the back of the calf, which corresponds directly with the upper intestine, would be massaged to trigger a healing flow of energy to the injury.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Eventually, Ayurvedic physicians around India learned of the technique's powers and brought kalari masters into hospitals to teach the art.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Marma-point training is mandatory for Ayurvedic surgeons. The Kalari gurukkal personally&nbsp;&nbsp;checks out any damage to ligaments after a training session.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aWVX_4A8hb8\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aWVX_4A8hb8</span></a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga has NO barriers.\nIt does NOT matter how old or young you are. It does NOT matter of you are a\nsupreme endurance athlete or a fat couch potato.&nbsp;&nbsp; The body uses its own weight.&nbsp; The idea is to explore your limits, &nbsp;not strive for some pretzel-like perfection. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Medical studies have been done with every sort of modern equipment.&nbsp; For belly obesity medical evaluations at\n3-month intervals, with subcutaneous and visceral fat were measured between the\nL4 and L5 vertebrae with a 16-detector helical computer topography (CT)\nabdominal scanner.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stress in the body\ncauses cortisol levels to peak and this in turn leads to lean muscle breakdown\nand the accumulation of fat in the abdominal region. &nbsp;There are three main stress busters: sleep,\nslow breath rate, and exercise- with a liberal dose of relaxation in between, only yoga understand this .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why relaxation?.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Running like a prick (\nor a twat as the case may be ) on the thread mill does little. &nbsp;Many people think that getting the heart rate\nup through jogging is a good way to lose weight. &nbsp;Modern research shows that this is a\nmisconception, and it is not a good way to lose weight at all. It can make a\nstressed nervous system even more exhausted, and lead to adrenal fatigue. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\">Below: Uneven pace on the thread mill - gives more results .</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Na_u5Bt60QI/VL3W-XexfVI/AAAAAAAA0tA/_04joFU-jPc/s1600/ima1bges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Na_u5Bt60QI/VL3W-XexfVI/AAAAAAAA0tA/_04joFU-jPc/s1600/ima1bges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>What is much better for weight loss is getting\nthe heart rate up for a very short burst and then dropping it right down, then\ngetting it up and then dropping it down. This is what ancient yoga achieves..</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In between bouts of\nSurya Namaskar you chill . &nbsp;You stand\nstill with gratitude in your heart with palms together and eyes closed for a few\nmoments moment. Then repeat it again, perhaps this time making the pace a\nlittle faster. &nbsp;Continue a few rounds\nlike this and you will have your heart rate at an optimum level; without the\ntiring and jarring effects your body gets from jogging.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; They should NOT do any inversions\nfor this reason, because the putrefied blood will rush to the higher organs and\nit will disturb the mind. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There can be women who\nlook slim but whose abdominal cavity is densely padded with unhealthy visceral\nfat.&nbsp; &nbsp;Fat cells that accumulate around the organs in\nthe abdomen are much more active than the ones found in subcutaneous fat. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the body is too\nacidic (low pH), then the body will attempt to protect itself from the acid by\nstoring fat and using it as a buffer. &nbsp;&nbsp;This\nis extremely dangerous because the visceral fat (the kind inside the organs and\nblood vesicles) accumulates within the veins and arteries, narrowing the\npassage available for the blood and gradually obstructs the activity of the\nblood vessels. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 24px; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-53Y5ehQbSKQ/VL3hEibe42I/AAAAAAAA0tY/f5Ztfin1DWg/s1600/06%2BKi38dney.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a result, the heart is\nforced to overwork just to maintain the blood circulation. &nbsp;If this continues to happen then the heart\ngets exhausted and a heart attack occurs. &nbsp;This is known as arteriosclerosis. So the pH\nbalance of the body is extremely important. All the money in your bank\nis NO use unless your health is good.&nbsp; It\nis NOT too late\u2014for yoga admits people of all ages, with various conditions . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even if you struggle\nwith conditions such as arthritis, osteoporosis, multiple sclerosis (MS), or\nchronic back pain that limits your mobility, there are exercises that can help.&nbsp; Yoga is a mortal enemy of inactivity which\ncauses certain muscles and tendons to &nbsp;become weaker , thus causing pain and\nstiffness. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The yoga teacher can\nguide them to a good start. Within a few weeks you can expect to gain\nflexibility in your hamstrings, back, shoulders, and hips. &nbsp;As we age, flexibility naturally decreases,\nwhich leads to pain and immobility. Yoga can ameliorate this irreversible process.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga teachers offer\nroutines specifically designed for certain conditions, such as arthritis or\nback pain, so you can look for a program that fits your specific needs. This\nwhy a good guru is a must. He has the experience to know your condition.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; Too many people now suffer from back pain by sitting for long\nhours at a computer, which can cause tightness and spinal compression. &nbsp;Yoga &nbsp;introduces you to meditation techniques, while\nsitting in front of your computer , such as watching the breath and how to\ndisengage from your thoughts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga teaches you NOT to\npiss on the present \u2013 because you are addicted to staring at the rear view mirror\nof life. &nbsp;I have never asked her what transpires between\nher and the tree during this grounding time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lSmNQX7xRHs/VL9zOvsSuPI/AAAAAAAA0uc/9gFjdsS-e24/s1600/earthin89gg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lSmNQX7xRHs/VL9zOvsSuPI/AAAAAAAA0uc/9gFjdsS-e24/s1600/earthin89gg.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/quantum-plant-tulsi-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your body is capable of\ngenerating electricity. Electricity allows your nervous system to send signals\nto your brain.&nbsp; &nbsp;These signals are actually electrical charges\nthat are delivered from cell to cell, allowing for nearly instantaneous\ncommunication.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The messages conducted\nvia electrical signals in your body are responsible for controlling the rhythm\nof your heartbeat, the movement of blood around your body, and much more.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your biological clock\neven uses electrical activity in order to help keep your circadian rhythms in\norder.&nbsp; You are, quite simply, an\nelectrical being. &nbsp;&nbsp;If electrical\nactivity stops in your body, you cannot survive.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RIcB-7Z8e2U/VL90RKgJ3mI/AAAAAAAA0uo/1l5t5bI4Bys/s1600/imaswevgges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"290\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RIcB-7Z8e2U/VL90RKgJ3mI/AAAAAAAA0uo/1l5t5bI4Bys/s1600/imaswevgges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_4CP-D5JBJQ/VL90XzCcj0I/AAAAAAAA0uw/_RxQXGy3nNo/s1600/7rehe6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"464\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_4CP-D5JBJQ/VL90XzCcj0I/AAAAAAAA0uw/_RxQXGy3nNo/s1600/7rehe6.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your cells generate\nelectrical charges via electrolytes like sodium and potassium using a mechanism\nknown as the \"sodium-potassium gate.\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"When your body\nneeds to send a message from one point to another, it opens the gate. When the\nmembrane gate opens, sodium and potassium ions move freely into and out of the\ncell.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/dynamics-within-human-cell-what.html\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/dynamics-within-human-cell-what.html</span></a><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-decoration: none;\">January 21, 2015 at 3:26 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_87MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi tss,<br />\n<br />\nthese are secrets of yoga.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/09/cellular-memory-complete-healing-capt.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_88b+seedFjhvD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_88b+seedFjhvD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/SREXQWAIDJk/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/SREXQWAIDJk&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/SREXQWAIDJk&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-L7VfgW_ShQs/VL-7iBxKQKI/AAAAAAAA0wI/Di5vr89G9_Y/s1600/man-and-lightnin74g.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-L7VfgW_ShQs/VL-7iBxKQKI/AAAAAAAA0wI/Di5vr89G9_Y/s1600/man-and-lightnin74g.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span>\n<i><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below:&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Grounding helps thin\nyour blood by improving its</span><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red;\"> zeta potential,</span><span style=\"color: blue;\"> which means it improves the energy\nbetween your red blood cells.</span></span><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It takes\nabout 75 minutes for the free electrons from the earth to reach your\nbloodstream and transform your blood. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hypercoagulable (thick,\nslow-moving) blood contributes to chronic inflammation, because when your blood\ndoes not flow well, oxygen can\u2019t get to your tissues. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Grounding\u2019s effect on blood thinning is clear\nand real.</span></span></i><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-X12Yo10qkNg/VL-fx70OEpI/AAAAAAAA0vA/ua4salZfHQM/s1600/1465513_634771vreg269737970000-1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-X12Yo10qkNg/VL-fx70OEpI/AAAAAAAA0vA/ua4salZfHQM/s1600/1465513_634771vreg269737970000-1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Colloids are held in\nsuspension via a very slight negative electrical charge on the surface of each\nparticle. Like charges repel each other. &nbsp;This charge is called zeta potential. &nbsp;Blood is a colloidal solution, and all blood\ncells have a slight negative charge. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Zeta potential is a\nmeasure of the electrical force that exists between atoms, molecules,\nparticles, and cells in a fluid. &nbsp;Zeta\npotential's strength determines the amount of material (nutrients, wastes) that\nfluids such as your blood and lymph can carry.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Increasing the\nelectrical force in the solution allows the fluid to dissolve and hold more\nmaterial. &nbsp;&nbsp;In this way, more nutrients\ncan be carried throughout your body and accumulated deposits of waste can be\nremoved.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-LKwgl6I3lJU/VMCYTXTzWtI/AAAAAAAA0xQ/3k-kVtHGd2M/s1600/3429376501_7542232_f6greet_on_a_sand_answer_2_xlarge.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-LKwgl6I3lJU/VMCYTXTzWtI/AAAAAAAA0xQ/3k-kVtHGd2M/s1600/3429376501_7542232_f6greet_on_a_sand_answer_2_xlarge.jpeg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the zeta potential\nis too low, blood begins to coagulate. This is a condition known as\nintravascular coagulation. &nbsp;Blood becomes\na sludge that is increasingly difficult for the heart to pump, and decreasingly\neffective at performing the usual functions of blood. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Blood\nsludge\" is widespread in the population (more than half the population\nwill die from heart problems). Blood is in constant motion at constant\ntemperature and the pH of blood is fixed at 7.35 to 7.4, but its concentration\nof electrolytes is not fixed, and the electrolytes directly affect the zeta\npotential.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below: &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Suryanamaskar must be\ndone in bare feet on bare ground with bare chest .</span><i><span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp;</span></i></span></span></b><i><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The soles of most\nmodern Nike type shoes are made from synthetic materials that can isolate your\nfeet and body from the Earth. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVIL\nPHARMA wants you to wear these modern shoes.</span></span></i><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/zbpXCj8Cl4o/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/zbpXCj8Cl4o&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/zbpXCj8Cl4o&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you walk barefoot\non the Earth, there's a transfer of free electrons from the Earth into your\nbody that spread throughout your tissues. margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"550\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-f9Mnoe9-3TQ/VMIS-gbOtxI/AAAAAAAA0zg/x7MtKPJZC54/s1600/yogabaergckpain.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga asanas stretch and\nhold-&nbsp; it causes &nbsp;muscles to lengthen, &nbsp;which gives the body a longer, leaner look. &nbsp;Muscles are challenged as the mind and body\nhave to work together simultaneously to hold a position or continue a\nsuccession without giving up. &nbsp;Breathing,\nposing, moving and increasing flexibility happen all together at one time,\nwhich solicits a new level of discipline in your mind and body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lxdl08Gwiow/VMITXykpHbI/AAAAAAAA0zo/YDLeC6PM3Ao/s1600/imstjkages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"276\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lxdl08Gwiow/VMITXykpHbI/AAAAAAAA0zo/YDLeC6PM3Ao/s1600/imstjkages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Isometric exercises are\none of the best ways to build core strength. &nbsp;Isometric, stemming from the words \u201csame\u201d and\n\u201clength,\u201d simply translates to holding one position without moving. &nbsp;Power yoga uses isometric exercises along with\nother postures that are designed to make the core and back stronger.\nFlexibility and balance stem from your core, so it is very important to train\nthis area of the body.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_Dgs7r4KgVQ/VMIT2nlJIfI/AAAAAAAA0zw/smJvln2Ul0s/s1600/spine-anatomyxafh-287x300.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_Dgs7r4KgVQ/VMIT2nlJIfI/AAAAAAAA0zw/smJvln2Ul0s/s1600/spine-anatomyxafh-287x300.jpg\" width=\"382\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An </span><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>isometric</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> exercise involves\nstatic contraction of a muscle without any visible movement in the angle of the\njoint.&nbsp; The length of the muscle and the\nangle of the joint do not change, though contraction strength may be varied. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Isometric exercise or\nisometrics are a type of strength training in which the joint angle and muscle\nlength do not change during contraction .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Isometrics are done in static positions, rather than being dynamic\nthrough a range of motion.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In an\novercoming isometric, the joint and muscle work against an immovable object. In\ncontrast, in a yielding isometric, the joint and muscle are held in a static\nposition while opposed by resistance.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-EI7oTTDBNPs/VMIceHwM63I/AAAAAAAA00A/6AO-X9a1cis/s1600/dowfrhjhnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"237\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-EI7oTTDBNPs/VMIceHwM63I/AAAAAAAA00A/6AO-X9a1cis/s1600/dowfrhjhnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is in contrast to </span><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>isotonic</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> contractions,\nin which the contraction strength does not change, though the muscle length and\njoint angle do.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">An isotonic contraction is one in which the\nmuscle maintains the same tension as it shortens.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large; line-height: 115%;\">Suryanamaskar is isotonic .</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/BMT4PtXRCVA/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/BMT4PtXRCVA&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/BMT4PtXRCVA&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Isotonic contractions come in two varieties:\nconcentric and eccentric. In a concentric contraction, the muscle shortens when\nits tension is greater than the force opposing it, such as your biceps does\nwhen performing an arm curl. &nbsp;In an\neccentric contraction, the force is greater than the muscle tension, causing\nthe muscle to elongate; this happens when going down stairs or sitting down in\na chair, as the effects of gravity add to the opposing force.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7_OO0T03Vm0/VMId0oPLBBI/AAAAAAAA00Q/uveNrlAHLus/s1600/musclhgbd-fibre-types-3-728.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7_OO0T03Vm0/VMId0oPLBBI/AAAAAAAA00Q/uveNrlAHLus/s1600/musclhgbd-fibre-types-3-728.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Isometric exercise can\nbe done anywhere using your own body weight. &nbsp;NASA has researched the use of Yoga ( STATIONARY isometrics plus MOVING isotonics ) in preventing muscle atrophy experienced by astronauts as a\nresult of living in a zero gravity environment. Contractile proteins are what\ncause muscles to contract and give them their physical strength .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Two types of protein in\nyour muscles, actin and myosin, contribute to the basic mechanisms of isotonic\ncontraction. &nbsp;&nbsp;During this type of\ncontraction, thick strands of myosin and thin strands of actin slide over each\nother, producing shortening in each individual muscle cell and the muscle as a\nwhole. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During isometric\ncontraction, your muscles keep their normal length rather than shortening or\nlengthening.&nbsp; &nbsp;An example of this kind of contraction occurs\nwhen you hold a weight in front of your body in a fixed position. Without your\nresistance, the weight would drive your arms and hands downward.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_JzDa9wlXIs/VMIdQNxoN8I/AAAAAAAA00I/tkDswfBYz-g/s1600/muscles-and-39movement-2-26-728.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_JzDa9wlXIs/VMIdQNxoN8I/AAAAAAAA00I/tkDswfBYz-g/s1600/muscles-and-39movement-2-26-728.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each posture, or asana,\nis held for a period of time and synchronised with the breath. Generally, a\nyoga session begins with gentle asanas and works up to the more vigorous or\nchallenging postures. A full yoga session should exercise every part of the\nbody and should include pranayama (breath control practices), relaxation and\nmeditation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VQkDxO6PnCQ/VMIkrqGEXDI/AAAAAAAA00c/Llqf6Iz6cL8/s1600/2sd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"225\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VQkDxO6PnCQ/VMIkrqGEXDI/AAAAAAAA00c/Llqf6Iz6cL8/s1600/2sd.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Osteoporosis \u2013 a\ncondition characterized by weak, thinning bones that can lead to serious\nfractures.&nbsp; .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/eYGkT6OrBk0/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/eYGkT6OrBk0&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/eYGkT6OrBk0&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;By practising just 10 minutes of yoga daily, participants with osteopenia (the precursor to osteoporosis) built their bone density back up into the normal range, while several participants with osteoporosis improved enough to be re-classified as having the milder osteopenia.</span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/vU8v3mf03E0/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/vU8v3mf03E0&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/vU8v3mf03E0&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga helps every which\nway. When all is lost yoga is the answer. From helping cancer patients recover\nfrom chemotherapy, to helping arthritis sufferers regain mobility in their\njoints, it can provide symptom relief when nothing else seems to work.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Below : <b>Suryanamaskar was designed to maintain &nbsp;</b></span><b><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">calcium</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;balance and strengthen your bones. &nbsp;</span></b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Suryanamaskar is done\nin early morning sun . The UV rays falling on your skin at this time are </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">beneficial in building Vitamin D.</span></b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GRVBaX13nMU/VMOAFHTO92I/AAAAAAAA00s/uEUmA9lIQCk/s1600/vitamin-d-metabofylism.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GRVBaX13nMU/VMOAFHTO92I/AAAAAAAA00s/uEUmA9lIQCk/s1600/vitamin-d-metabofylism.gif\" width=\"293\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calcium is required for\nmaking healthy bones. &nbsp;Calcium cannot be\nmade by the body. The body gets the calcium it needs through the food you eat.\nIf you do not get enough calcium in your diet or if your body does not absorb\nenough, your bones can get weak or not grow properly. Vitamin D helps your body\nabsorb calcium&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">endogenously , when\nultraviolet rays from sunlight strike the skin and trigger vitamin D synthesis.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-wBB8qhY3GB0/VMOAy6XTR3I/AAAAAAAA000/t0ZmhbGsOHk/s1600/top-5-fodg9ods-for-strong-bones-2-728.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-wBB8qhY3GB0/VMOAy6XTR3I/AAAAAAAA000/t0ZmhbGsOHk/s1600/top-5-fodg9ods-for-strong-bones-2-728.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vitamin D promotes\ncalcium absorption in the gut and maintains adequate serum calcium and\nphosphate concentrations to enable normal mineralization of bone .&nbsp; Without sufficient vitamin D, bones can\nbecome thin, brittle, or misshapen. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In addition to its\nwell-known involvement in calcium balance and bone metabolism, vitamin D has a\nnumber of other physiological roles, including maintaining muscle strength,\nmodulating immune function, and regulating blood pressure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vitamin D functions to\nhelp regulate cellular differentiation, the biological process by which cells\nbecome specialized for a specific function. &nbsp;Due to these physiological functions, vitamin\nD has been implicated in protection against muscle pain and weakness, certain\nautoimmune diseases, hypertension, and even some forms of cancer.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember, your skin\nmakes vitamin D from the ultra-violet light (<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">UVB rays</b>) in sunlight. &nbsp;Your body is able to store the vitamin and use\nit later. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_lHDqs7_5Gw/VMOFwrWtX7I/AAAAAAAA01A/W5CtSPuAyDI/s1600/G44sdbsfT.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"203\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_lHDqs7_5Gw/VMOFwrWtX7I/AAAAAAAA01A/W5CtSPuAyDI/s1600/G44sdbsfT.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga poses are meant to\ntrain the body to be healthy and supple. Consistent practice and application\nwill result in improved posture, and an increased sense of balance, with head,\nshoulders and pelvis in proper alignment.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/diG519dFVNs/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/diG519dFVNs&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/diG519dFVNs&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Additionally, unlike\nmany other forms of exercise, yoga helps stretch and strengthens both sides of\nthe body equally.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/178XnTK5uHk/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/178XnTK5uHk&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/178XnTK5uHk&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proper body alignment\nand good posture, which helps maintain the natural curvature of the spine, is\nan important part of reducing or avoiding lower back pain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/Go3ilnDGc00/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/Go3ilnDGc00&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/Go3ilnDGc00&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Awareness of the body\nthrough yoga increases with practice. In theory, specific positioning and repositioning\nnot only limbers the body, but also trains people to understand the limitations\nof their body.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/nV4ILsaVSXc/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/nV4ILsaVSXc&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/nV4ILsaVSXc&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An increased awareness\nacts as a preventative measure, in that the individual will know what types of\nmotions should and should not be avoided.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/XeXz8fIZDCE/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/XeXz8fIZDCE&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/XeXz8fIZDCE&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Back pain is associated\nwith the way our bones, muscles and ligaments in our backs work together.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The classical\ndefinition of Yoga as a discipline to control the whirlpools of the\nsubconscious The Patanjala Yoga Sutra consists of short succinct Sutras that\nrun together as if they were making up a garland of pearls on a string.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sutras\nwere always kept short as they were intended to be learnt, memorized. Patanjali\nhas arranged all the Sutras in a deductive and logical manner with numerous\ncross references to various important concepts such as the Kleshas, Karma,\nAntaraaya, Siddhis and Gunas etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Patanjali deals with\nthe concept of Samadhi classifying it into numerous levels and sublevels. The\nlower state of Samprajnata (that which is obtained&nbsp;&nbsp; through cognitive thought) is sub-classified\ninto four levels in 1.17 as:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Vitarka - obtained\nwith deep contemplation on gross thought<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Vichara - obtained\nwith deep contemplation on subtle thought<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Ananda - obtained\nwith deep contemplation on inner eternal bliss<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Asmita - obtained\nwith deep contemplation on \u2018that\u2019 which defines one\u2019s&nbsp;&nbsp; individuality from the universality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Indian\nmethod of school ( gurukul )is different from the Western method. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/shravana-manana-nididhyasana-way-of.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/shravana-manana-nididhyasana-way-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The concept of the\nDivine is dealt with by Patanjali in verses 1.24-1.26 where&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">he stresses the\nimportance of the Pranava and its Japa. The Pranava&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">OM ( AUM ) is the first and foremost of all Hindu\nmantras.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantra is the sound body of consciousness. OM is considered as the\nsound of Cosmic Energy and contains all the sounds in itself. The spiritual\nefficacy of Om is heard, not by the ears but by the heart ( 7.83 hertz )</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/om-aum-sound-of-zpf-cymatics-sound-of.html\" style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/om-aum-sound-of-zpf-cymatics-sound-of.html</a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Patanjali says \u201ctasya\nvachahah pranava\u201d \u2013 the&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">vibrational sound of\nthe Divine is the Pranava (1.27).</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pranava consists of\nthe three sacred sounds (Nada) that may be&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">expressed as:</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 The Akara Nada\u2013 the\nAAA sound representing creation</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 The Ukara Nada \u2013 the\nOOO / UUU sound representing sustenance and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 The Makara Nada \u2013 the\nMMM sound representing dissolution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OM has been lifted by\nevery other religion.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
